DECLARE @search nvarchar(2000),@CalendarID INT
SELECT @CalendarID = CalendarID FROM abcCalendar WHERE [Date] = dbo.abcdate()
SET @search=N'?id=' + dbo.nv(@CalendarID)
EXEC sp_api_goto @path,@search
moment >= dbo.abcdate() --AND {[xpricemoment].Moment}<=getdate()

IF @id<>@ids --BULK naar Exact
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT,@count int = 0,@seconds int = 0
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @seconds+=6
				SET @subject = CONCAT(
					(SELECT [xCompany].[Code] FROM [xCompany] WHERE [id] = (SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[fromCompany_ID] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval))
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[dateInvoice] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[calcLegal] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					)
				SET @sql = CONCAT(N'DECLARE @base64 nvarchar(max),@filename nvarchar(4000)
', --EXEC sp_api_report_download_base64 @context = ''invoice_out'', @context_id = ',@idval,' , @filename =  @filename OUT, @base64 =  @base64 OUT
'BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice ',@idval,',@groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	UPDATE xInvoice SET status = ''Exact Error'',statusHistory = ERROR_MESSAGE() WHERE id = ',@idval,'
END CATCH') -- = @filename,@subject = ',dbo.escape_string(@subject),',@base64 = @base64')
				SET @subject = N'To Exact: ' + @subject
				EXEC sp_api_add_sql_task @sql=@sql,@description=@subject,@seconds = @seconds
				UPDATE xInvoice SET status='Sending to Exact' WHERE id = @idval
				SET @count+=1
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor;
		execute sp_api_modal_clear
		IF @count > 0 EXEC sp_api_toast N'Verzenden is ingepland, F5 voor refresh'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
		RETURN
	END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xIVLINK  where (ITD IN({@IDS}) OR VTD IN({@IDS})) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xtransactionheader WHERE [status] = 'openPrice'))
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'De inkoop is toegewezen aan een commissie verkoop!',N'De regel kan niet verwijderd worden!'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		RETURN;
	END
	
IF {[inkoop].status} IN('openPurchase','openPurchaseC') OR {[inkoop_loods].status} IN('openPurchase','openPurchaseC') OR {[ctr1].CTH_fase} IN('openPurchase','openPurchaseC')
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Zeker weten?',N'Het aantal wordt op 0 gezet, en daarna geheel verwijderd!'
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN	
				IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM code_ctr_at_location WHERE ctr_id = @idval GROUP BY ctr_id HAVING SUM(amount) = SUM(available))
					BEGIN
						DECLARE @detail nvarchar(255), @TH_id nvarchar(255)
						SET @detail = (SELECT concat(Amount,' ',detail) from q_xtransactiondetail where id = @idval)
						SET @TH_id = (SELECT transactionheader_id from q_xtransactiondetail where id = @idval)
						DECLARE @textlog nvarchar(255) = concat(N'actie [Verwijder] gestart op order: ',@TH_id,' op product: ',@detail)
						EXEC @main_db.dbo.actielog @Card_name , @textlog
						
						EXEC @main_db.dbo.DeleteCTR @idval
					END
				ELSE
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_toast N'Kan ctr niet verwijderen: deels overgebracht of toegewezen'
					END
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor;
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'De inkoop is gesloten',N'De regel kan niet verwijderd worden!'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		RETURN;
	END

DECLARE @time time = CAST(SYSDATETIME() as time)


DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@fid INT,@fname nvarchar(128),@class nvarchar(128)
SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT id,name FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id ORDER BY detail_order
OPEN @cursor_ids;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @fid,@fname
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN

		DECLARE @is_field_updateable BIT
		EXEC @is_field_updateable = sp_api_card_field_is_updateable @fid,@id
		IF @is_field_updateable = 1
			SET @class= 'text-success'
		ELSE
			SET @class= 'text-danger'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @fname,@class

		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @fid,@fname
	END
CLOSE @cursor_ids;
DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

DECLARE @wat nvarchar(200), @linktoME int,@text nvarchar(max)

IF {[ctr2].cth_fase} NOT IN (N'openSale','openPrice')
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_Alert N'Let op!', N'De verkoop is reeds gesloten. U kan niet meer de toewijzing wijzigen.' 
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END

SET @linktoME ={[ctr2].id}
--201028 erbij ivm overbrengen..
if @LinkToMe is NULL set @LinkToMe={[ctr_overbrengen].id}

DECLARE @maxTeLinken INT,@maxBeschikbaar INT
SELECT @maxTeLinken = (ctrAmount-IVTOTAL) FROM Q_xTransactionDetail WHERE ID=@LinkToME

IF @maxTeLinken = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Regel is al volledig toegewezen'
		EXEC	 sp_api_go2 1 -- 1 stap terug (+list view; detailviewgebruik EXEC sp_api_go2 1,0)
		RETURN;
	END


SET @maxBeschikbaar = {[ctr1_toewijsbaar].available}
IF @maxBeschikbaar < @maxTeLinken
	BEGIN
		declare @Melding nvarchar(200)
		set @Melding = concat(N'Niet genoeg beschikbaar! Te linken:',N' ',@maxTeLinken)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @Melding,N'h4 text-muted'
		SET @text = CONCAT('U kunt maximaal ',@maxBeschikbaar,' van de ',@maxTeLinken,' linken')
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,N'm-4'
		SET @maxTeLinken = @maxBeschikbaar
	END

IF @maxTeLinken < 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Probleem!',N'Regel heeft meer toegewezen dan mag. Ga naar de toewijzing (IV link) en verlaag deze.'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END

DECLARE @aantalTeLinken INT = @maxTeLinken
	,@button nvarchar(50)

EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Aantal',@value = @aantalTeLinken OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Link aantal',@valueout=@button OUT,@key=N'Enter'
IF @button IS NULL RETURN
set @wat=N'Gekozen ID: '+str(@ID)+' wordt gekoppeld aan CTR: '+str(@LinktoME)
exec sp_api_toast @wat
--RETURN; --test

if @linktoME is not null
	BEGIN
		exec @main_db.dbo.map @linktoME,@ID, @aantalTeLinken
		
		--zet return path
		SET @ctr2_id = {[ctr2].id}
		SET @verkoop_id = {[verkoop].id}
		IF @ctr2_id IS NOT NULL AND @verkoop_id IS NOT NULL AND @aantalTeLinken = @maxTeLinken
			BEGIN
				SET @goto = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2/',@ctr2_id,'/iv2')
				SET @referer_path = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2')
				SET @referer_search = CONCAT(N'?id=',@ctr2_id)
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Regel(s) is/zijn gelink bla',N'alert-primary'				
				EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@referer_path,@referer_search=@referer_search
			END
		--210115 
--		exec sp_api_go3
		exec sp_api_modal_clear
	END

-- {[ctr2].Amount} 

--EXEC sp_api_modal_set N'bewaar_kruimel_path',N'/inkoop' --@path
--EXEC sp_api_modal_set N'bewaar_kruimel_search',N'?id=123' --@path
if {[ctr2].Amount} is not null --we zitten op ctr2
	begin

		DECLARE @count_iv2 INT = (SELECT sum(linkaantal) FROM xIvlink WHERE ITD = @id or vtd = @id)-- RH210116 OR vtd.. er bij (er was een overmatige toewijzing)
		DECLARE @DIFF INT 
		set @DIFF=	( select isnull({[ctr2].Amount}*iif({[ctr2].stockmut}=0,0,1),0) - @count_iv2)
		EXEC SP_API_TOAST @diff
		IF ISNULL(@count_iv2,0)=0 or @DIFF > 0 --@count_iv2 <>isnull({[ctr2].Amount}*iif({[ctr2].stockmut}=0,0,1),0)--= 0
			BEGIN
				IF NOT EXISTS (select * from @main_db.dbo.ctr1_Assignable(NULL,@id))
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Geen partij met voorraad beschikbaar!'
						EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
						RETURN
					END
				SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/ctr1_toewijsbaar'
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				IF @DIFF < 0 -- meer toegewezen dan de ctr groot is
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Er is te veel toegewezen!, verlaag de toewijzing of verwijder een toewijzing!'	
					END	
				SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/iv2'
			END
	
		EXEC sp_api_goto @path
	end

else
 EXEC SP_API_TOAST @card_name

			SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/iv2'

	end

else
 EXEC SP_API_TOAST @card_name

-- {[ctr2].Amount} 
DECLARE @count_iv2 INT = (SELECT sum(linkaantal) FROM xIvlink WHERE ITD = @id)
IF @count_iv2 <>{[ctr2].Amount}*iif({[ctr2].stockmut}=0,0,1)--= 0
	SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/ctr1_toewijsbaar'
ELSE
	SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/iv2'

EXEC sp_api_goto @path

IF @count_iv2 = 0

ELSE
	EXEC sp_api_keypress N'Alt+T'

DECLARE @wat nvarchar(200), @linktoME int,@text nvarchar(max)

IF {[ctr2].cth_fase} NOT IN (N'openSale','openPrice')
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_Alert N'Let op!', N'De verkoop is reeds gesloten. U kan niet meer de toewijzing wijzigen.' 
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END

SET @linktoME ={[ctr2].id}
--201028 erbij ivm overbrengen..
if @LinkToMe is NULL set @LinkToMe={[ctr_overbrengen].id}

DECLARE @maxTeLinken INT,@maxBeschikbaar INT
SELECT @maxTeLinken = (ctrAmount-IVTOTAL) FROM Q_xTransactionDetail WHERE ID=@LinkToME

IF @maxTeLinken = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Regel is al volledig toegewezen'
		EXEC	 sp_api_go2 1 -- 1 stap terug (+list view; detailviewgebruik EXEC sp_api_go2 1,0)
		RETURN;
	END


SET @maxBeschikbaar = {[ctr1_toewijsbaar].available}
IF @maxBeschikbaar < @maxTeLinken
	BEGIN
		declare @Melding nvarchar(200)
		set @Melding = concat(N'Niet genoeg beschikbaar! Te linken:',N' ',@maxTeLinken)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @Melding,N'h4 text-muted'
		SET @text = CONCAT('U kunt maximaal ',@maxBeschikbaar,' van de ',@maxTeLinken,' linken')
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,N'm-4'
		SET @maxTeLinken = @maxBeschikbaar
	END

IF @maxTeLinken < 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Probleem!',N'Regel heeft meer toegewezen dan mag. Ga naar de toewijzing (IV link) en verlaag deze.'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END

DECLARE @aantalTeLinken INT = @maxTeLinken
	,@button nvarchar(50)

EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Aantal',@value = @aantalTeLinken OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Link aantal',@valueout=@button OUT,@key=N'Enter'
IF @button IS NULL RETURN
set @wat=N'Gekozen ID: '+str(@ID)+' wordt gekoppeld aan CTR: '+str(@LinktoME)
exec sp_api_toast @wat
--RETURN; --test

if @linktoME is not null
	BEGIN
		exec @main_db.dbo.map @linktoME,@ID, @aantalTeLinken
		
		--zet return path
		SET @ctr2_id = {[ctr2].id}
		SET @verkoop_id = {[verkoop].id}
		IF @ctr2_id IS NOT NULL AND @verkoop_id IS NOT NULL AND @aantalTeLinken = @maxTeLinken
			BEGIN
				SET @goto = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2/',@ctr2_id,'/iv2')
				SET @referer_path = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2')
				SET @referer_search = CONCAT(N'?id=',@ctr2_id)
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Regel(s) is/zijn gelink bla',N'alert-primary'				
				EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@referer_path,@referer_search=@referer_search
			END
		--210115 
--		exec sp_api_go3
		exec sp_api_modal_clear
	END


--if @parent_card_name='ctr2'
--	BEGIN
--		exec @main_db.dbo.map @ID, @Parent_ID
--	END
--else --neem aan parent_parent...
--	BEGIN
--		exec @main_db.dbo.map @ID, @Parent_Parent_ID
--	END

--EXEC sp_api_goto @path

--EXEC sp_api_toast @parent_parent_id
--exec sp_api_toast @User
	
DECLARE @CTHID INT = {[ompakken].id} --200818 curly
IF @CTHID IS NULL begin
		EXEC sp_api_toast 'Kan geen [ompakken2] vinden'
		RETURN;
		end
--ELSE EXEC sp_api_toast @CTHID

IF {[ompakken].status} not in ('openRepack') BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_alert 'Toevoegen alleen bij status: openRepack'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear		
	RETURN;	
	end

-- 200629 Uitbreiding inkoop vanuit diverse contexten: Zoek CTH ; bijv als we afkomstig zijn van een regel, dan is CTH te vinden in de regel
--if @parent_card_name ='verkoop'	set @CTHID=@parent_id
--if @parent_card_name = 'ctr2' set @CTHID=(select TransactionHeader_ID from xtransactiondetail where xtransactiondetail.id=@parent_id)

DECLARE @mes nvarchar(200), @FustSaldo int, @CoreType nvarchar(10),@FustID int, @xDesc nvarchar(200)
SELECT @xDesc=x.[Description],@mes= concat('Ompak in ' , x.[Description]) ,@Coretype= x.coretype,@FustID=x.Fust_ID from xstock x where x.id=@ID --@main_db.dbo.
--EXEC sp_api_modal_text @mes,'h2 text-primary'
------
IF @coretype in('CRATE','PALLET')
	BEGIN
		SELECT @Fustsaldo=Fustsaldo from @main_db.dbo.FustSaldo_FC(@FustID,{[verkoop].Counterparty_ID})
		EXEC sp_api_toast @Fustsaldo
		-- breid DECLARE message uit met het fust-saldo
		IF @FustSaldo is not NULL
			SET @mes=concat('Fust bij- of afboeken (', @xDesc,') actueel saldo bij deze klant: ',@fustsaldo)
		ELSE
			SET @mes=concat('Fust bij- of afboeken (', @xDesc,') => let op: deze klant heeft dit fust nooit eerder gehad!')
	END

DECLARE @text nvarchar(max),@prodcode_id INT,@artcode_id INT
DECLARE @aantal nvarchar(20),@opmerking nvarchar(50) --='100'
DECLARE @CounterpartyID int
DECLARE @FlowModel int
DECLARE @THDT INT
SELECT @CounterpartyID = CTH.counterparty_ID,@FlowModel=FlowModel_ID,@THDT=TDT From xTransactionHeader CTH where CTH.ID=@CTHID
--200630 was@parent_id

--200708 => ??? WAAROM GAAT DIT NIET ??? select @Prijs= @main_db.dbo.StockPrice(@ID,@CTHID,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL)

EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = @mes,@class = 'h3 text-muted'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Aantal'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='aantal',@value = @aantal OUT,@focus=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Opm. loods'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='opmerking',@value = @opmerking OUT
DECLARE @button nvarchar(128)
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Toevoegen',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
IF @button IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		IF 		--TRY_CAST(@prijs as decimal) > 0 AND 
				TRY_CAST(@aantal as int) > 0 
				OR @FustSaldo is not NULL -- 200921 Als het een selectie van LEEG FUST betreft, dan mag het aantal Negatief zijn!
			BEGIN
				exec @main_db.dbo.CreateCTR @CTH_ID=@CTHID, @stock_ID=@ID,@Amount=@Aantal,@Price=NULL,@Logistic=@Opmerking, @User=@User,@forcedTDT=1
				select @mes = 'Er zijn '+@Aantal+ ' colli '+ x.[Description]+' toegevoegd aan de order' from xstock x where x.id=@ID
				exec sp_api_toast @mes
				EXEC sp_api_modal_clear						

			END
		ELSE
			EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Aantal of prijs niet geldig!','text-danger'
	END

--text, class, translate (bit)
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies Enter om de vorige prijzen te gebruiken.',@translate=1 --vertaalbaar
DECLARE @button nvarchar(128) --button nodig om DECLARE oude SET nog te hebben.
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Okay!',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter' --is initieel leeg
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = 'Nah',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Escape' --is initieel leeg
IF @button IS NULL EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all --STEP 1 SELECT all
 -- na klik
IF @button = 'Nah' OR @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear -- einde formweergave; handel alleen nog de CURSOR af
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear --STEP 2 SELECT clear all en de rest
	END
IF @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN

		DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
		-- onderbreek de actie alos er meer dan 1 leverancier in DECLARE selectie voor komt
		if	(SELECT count( distinct supplier_ID) FROM p_PriceEntryRow where id in (SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,','))) > 1
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Selecteer niet meer dan 1 leverancier!'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_clear 
				return;
			END

		SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor_ids;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				UPDATE p_PriceEntryRow SET PriceHi = OldPriceHi, PriceLo = OldPriceLo WHERE id = @cid
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
			END
		CLOSE @cursor_ids;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

	END

--	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--	instant_report: BREAKDOWN_CTH1
--	toont een overzicht van de partijkosten en verkoopopbrengsten
--	pre declare: @buttonmore,@buttonmore2, @mt
--	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class=N'w100',@printStyle=N'font-size:70%',@landscape=1

declare @CTHID int={[inkoop].id}
if @CTHID is null set @CTHID={[verkoop].id}

exec sp_api_toast N'kosten'

--exec @main_db.dbo.create_demo_1 
if @CTHID IS NULL
	begin
		execute sp_api_modal_alert_new N'Breakdown heeft een Inkoop of verkoop nodig.'
		return;-- afkappen
	end
--210830 totalen bovenaan even tonen in EURO!
declare @LFC float=--(	select sum(isnull(nullif(cost,0),0)*isnull(nullif(xrate,0),1)) from @main_db.dbo.xCostReg_ALL_CTH(@CTHID) where landfreight_id>0)
					(	select sum(eurbedrag) from @main_db.dbo.xCostReg_ALL_CTH(@CTHID) where landfreight_id>0)
if @lfc is not null
	begin
		declare @lfctext nvarchar(512)=concat('Totaal op Landfreight geboekt: ',@lfc)	
		exec sp_api_modal_text @lfctext
	end

declare @CTHC float=(	select sum(isnull(nullif(cost,0),0)*isnull(nullif(xrate,0),1)) from xcostregistration where transaction_id=@CTHID) 
if @CTHC is not null
	begin
		declare @CTHCtext nvarchar(512)=concat('Totaal op CTH geboekt: ',@cthc)	
		exec sp_api_modal_text @CTHCtext
	end

declare @CTRC float=(	select sum(isnull(nullif(cost,0),0)*isnull(nullif(xrate,0),1)) from xcostregistration 
where ctr_id in (select id from xtransactiondetail where transactionheader_id=@CTHID) )
if @CTRC is not null
	begin
		declare @CTRCtext nvarchar(512)=concat('Totaal op CTR(s) geboekt: ',@ctrc)	
		exec sp_api_modal_text @CTRCtext
	end
	
--SELECT --lfctr_ctr_part,C_Part_CTR_CTH,
select ctr_id,lfctr_colli as [lfctrColli@:2],rpCTH_Costs_P as [CTHP@:2],lfctr_Pal,cth_PCost as CTH_P,LFCTRcosts_C as [CTHC@:2]
, CTH_CCost as CTH_C,ctr_dirkosten * lfctr_ctr_part as [CTRDIRECT@:2],LFP as [LFP@:2]
--,P_Part_LFCTR_LF as lfctr_lf_deel@ -- LFCTR deel van de LF (optellen per LF moet 1 zijn)
, CP_CostLF as LF_P, lfctr_ccc as colPrijs, Lfctr_CCPP ,lfctr_ColliKosten as colTot, [regeltotaal@:2]=lfctr_colli * lfctr_collikosten
--, ctr_totalCosts_C
--,isnull(cth_PCost,0)+ isnull(CTH_CCost,0) as CTH
--,CTR_COL
--,ctr_cth_Cost   
INTO #BreakDown FROM @main_db.dbo.lfctr_breakdown(@CTHID,0)          

exec sp_api_modal_print -- zet de print button boven (=BROWSER CTRL-P)
set @mt=concat(N'Dit is de kostenverdeling van de geboekte kosten op partij ',{[inkoop].Lotnumber})
exec sp_api_modal_text @mt , @class='h2', @PrintOnly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#BreakDown', @PRINT=1


--MORE? PREDECLARE @buttonmore
IF @buttonmore IS NULL
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'',N'm-4'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@buttonmore',@value = 'Meer info...', @valueout = @buttonmore OUT,@class='btn-tracy',@key='PageDown'
		RETURN
	END

select costReg_ID,suppliercode,costdate, eurbedrag as [Eurobedrag@:2], [description] 
			,invoicenumber,gl_number,dateinvoice --inv en gl er bij 211125RH
INTO #CostReg FROM @main_db.dbo.xCostReg_ALL_CTH(@CTHID)          
exec sp_api_modal_text N'Geregistreerde kosten:' , @class='h5', @Print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#costReg', @PRINT=1

select ctr_id, [aantal@]=sum(lfctr_col), [niet_ingedeeld@:2]=sum([0]), [agf@:2]=sum([1]), [rabat@:2]=sum([2]), [transport@:2]=sum([3]),
						[overig@:2]=sum([4]), [sum5@:2]=sum([5]) 
	into #piv1	from piv_xcostregistration where cth_id=@CTHID group by ctr_id
exec sp_api_modal_text N'Kosten kolommen:' , @class='h5', @Print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#piv1', @PRINT=1


--MORE? PREDECLARE @buttonmore2 VERKOOP OPBRENGST ( ALLEEN BIJ INKOOPBREAKDOWN )
IF @buttonmore2 IS NULL AND {[inkoop].id} is NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'',N'm-4'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@buttonmore2',@value = 'Toon de verkoopopbrengst', @valueout = @buttonmore OUT,@class='btn-tracy',@key='PageDown'
		RETURN
	END

--210901 Toon verkoop opbrengst en kosten voor partijuitmelding
/*
select * from SalesResultCTH1(13237)
*/
select lotrefrowid as [ctr1~col-sm-1-2],(select D from @main_db.dbo.ctr_description_prod(lotrefrowid)) as [prod*]
	,(select D from @main_db.dbo.ctr_description(lotrefrowid)) as [artikel], TV_CODE as Customer,cth2 as [order~col-sm-1-2],	ctr_id as [ctr2~col-sm-1-2]
	,	LFDate as [Date~col-sm-1],	colli_gefactureerd as [Colli@~col-sm-1-2],	gemiddeld as [SalesCol:2~col-sm-1-2],	omzet as [NetSales@:2~col-sm-1]
	,	bookedcosts as [SalesCosts@:2~col-sm-1]
	, bookedcosts/nullif(colli_gefactureerd,0) as [CostCol:2~col-sm-1-2]
	,isnull(gemiddeld,0)-isnull(bookedcosts/nullif(colli_gefactureerd,0),0) as [NETT_COL:2]
INTO #SalesRes FROM @main_db.dbo.[RowResultEUR_CTH1_perCTR2](@CTHID) --order by lotrefrowid
exec sp_api_modal_text N'Geregistreerde verkoop opbrengsten:' , @class='h5', @Print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#SalesRes', @PRINT=1,@orderby='ORDER BY 1'-- maak alles het printbaar 
--@PRINTONLY=1 (hidden op scherm, maar wel op printer)--,@orderby=N'ORDER BY [wawa*],lalaDescription ASC'

-- PARTIJ-RESULTAAT
select CTR1_ID,	leverancier,	klant,CTH2_ID,	CTR2_ID, Orderdatum,	
		Aantal as [Aantal@]
		,-1 * I_PRIJS as [I_PRIJS@:2],	-1 * (I_RABAT+	I_TRANSP+	I_OVERIG) as [I_KOST@:2]
		,-1 * V_PRIJS as [V_PRIJS@:2],	-1 * V_RABAT as [V_RABAT@:2],	-1* V_TRANSP as [V_TRANSP@:2],	-1 * V_OVERIG as [V_OVERIG@:2]--	V_AMT_CTR	I_AMT_CTR
		, rowresult as [Resultaat@:2]
	into #ivresult
	FROM @main_db.dbo.[IV_RESULT] where CTH1_ID =@CTHID
exec sp_api_modal_text N'Partij resultaatregels :' , @class='h5', @Print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#ivresult', @PRINT=1

exec sp_api_modal_alert_new @main_text

--RH210215 BEZIG DOWNLOAD ALS CSV ER BIJ.. lukt nofg niet..
DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128),@companyname nvarchar(128), @FileName nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
SET @companyname = (select CompanyName from xcompany where id = @id)
set @Filename=concat(@Companyname,'.csv')
/*EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Zoek op transport bedrijf'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Transporteur',@value = @TransComp OUT,@focus=1,@select=1 -- zoek veld
*/
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24',@focus=1,@select=1  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')
SET @button = 'Intrastat_Melding'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Intrastat_Melding',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Excel_CSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @companyname,N'h4 text-muted',@printonly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_print

IF @button =  'Intrastat_Melding'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY@] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE~col-sm-5] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT@] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT@] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_Melding
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_Melding',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2 ASC',@print=1

END 
	

IF @button =  'Excel_CSV'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_CSV
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO

EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT
SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,'','')
OPEN @cursor;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @idval
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
	END
CLOSE @cursor;
DEALLOCATE @cursor;

DECLARE @mainclass nvarchar(128) = N'm-4 text-muted'
	,@text nvarchar(max)

EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = N'Add a JSON field',@class = N'h4 text-muted'--, @translate = 1
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = N'Choose a column which is the JSON data store',@class = @mainclass--, @translate = 1

IF @tablename LIKE 'api[_]%'
	BEGIN
		SELECT id=name,name INTO #sys_columns_proj FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = (SELECT object_id FROM sys.objects WHERE name = @basetable) AND max_length=-1
		SET @tmptable=N'#sys_columns_proj'
	END
ELSE
	BEGIN
		SELECT id=name,name INTO #sys_columns FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = (SELECT object_id FROM sys_objects WHERE name = @basetable) AND max_length=-1
		SET @tmptable=N'#sys_columns'
	END


DECLARE @json_column nvarchar(128),@json_key nvarchar(4000)
EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=@tmptable,@value = @json_column OUT,@focus=1--,@select=1

IF @json_column IS NULL RETURN
DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max)
CREATE TABLE #in_use (JSON nvarchar(max))
SET @sql = CONCAT(N'INSERT #in_use SELECT ''[''+LEFT(',QUOTENAME(@json_column),',200)+'']'' FROM ',QUOTENAME(@tablename)
		,' WHERE ISJSON(',QUOTENAME(@json_column),') = 0 AND ',QUOTENAME(@json_column),'> '''' ORDER BY newid()')
EXEC(@sql)
--DECLARE @json nvarchar(max) = (SELECT * FROM #in_use FOR JSON AUTO, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES)
--EXEC sp_api_modal_text @json

IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM  #in_use)
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = N'⚠️ Some fields (top 25 shown) are in use as non-JSON. These will be over-written:',@class = @mainclass
		EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#in_use',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 1 OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 25 ROWS ONLY'
--		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END
CREATE TABLE #json_keys (id nvarchar(4000),name nvarchar(4000))
SET @sql = CONCAT(N'INSERT #json_keys SELECT DISTINCT id = j.[key],name = j.[key] FROM ',QUOTENAME(@tablename)
	,' CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(',QUOTENAME(@json_column),') j WHERE ISJSON(',QUOTENAME(@json_column),') > 0')
EXEC(@sql)

EXEC sp_api_modal_text @button_choose2
*/

--RETURN
DECLARE @button_choose nvarchar(128) = 'Custom'
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM #json_keys)
	BEGIN
		SET @button_choose = 'Predefined'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_choose @list = N'Predefined,Custom',@value = @button_choose OUT
		IF @button_choose = N'Predefined'
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = N'Choose a predefined field name / JSON key:',@class = @mainclass
				EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#json_keys',@value = @json_key OUT --,@select=1
			END
	END

IF @button_choose = 'Custom'
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = N'Choose a custom field name / JSON key:',@class = @mainclass
		EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='JSON key', @value= @json_key OUT,@class='' ,@focus=1,@select=1,@inline=1
		DECLARE @button1 nvarchar(128),@button_text1 nvarchar(128) = 'Validate'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button1',@value = @button_text1, @valueout = @button1 OUT ,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
	END

IF NULLIF(@json_key,'') IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		--DECLARE @field_name nvarchar(128) = N'json_' + @json_key,@detail_order INT,@detail_page INT
		DECLARE @field_name nvarchar(128),@detail_order INT,@detail_page INT
		SET @field_name = 'json_' + @json_key
		IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id AND name = @field_name)
			BEGIN
				SET @text = N'⚠️ Field ['+@field_name+'] already exists'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,@class = @mainclass
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @text = N'✔️ Field ['+@field_name+'] will be created'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,@class = @mainclass
				DECLARE @button2 nvarchar(128),@button_text2 nvarchar(128) = 'Create Field'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = @button_text2, @valueout = @button2 OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Insert'
				IF @button2 IS NOT NULL
					BEGIN
						SELECT @detail_order=detail_order,@detail_page = detail_page FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id AND id = @card_field_id
						IF @detail_order IS NULL SET @detail_order = 4
						IF @detail_page IS NULL SET @detail_page = 0
						SET @detail_order-=1
						INSERT api_card_fields (card_id,name,unparsed_sql,sql,detail_order,detail_page)
							VALUES(@card_id,@field_name,'dbo.json_get('+QUOTENAME(@json_column)+','
							+ dbo.escape_string(@json_key) + ')','dbo.json_get('+QUOTENAME(@json_column)+','
							+ dbo.escape_string(@json_key) + ')',@detail_order,@detail_page)
						DECLARE @new_field_id INT = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
						INSERT api_card_field_attributes (field_id,attr_id,unparsed_sql,sql)
						VALUES(@new_field_id,(SELECT id FROM api_attributes WHERE name = 'is_updateable'),'@is_updateable','@is_updateable')
						--EXEC sp_api_populate_card @card_id
					END

			END
/*
		;WITH nums as (SELECT a = 1 UNION ALL SELECT a=a+1 FROM nums WHERE a < 100)
			SELECT TOP 1 @json_key+=dbo.nv(IIF(a=1,NULL,a)) FROM nums WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id AND name = @json_key+dbo.nv(a))
				 ORDER BY a
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @json_key
*/
	END





IF @button1 IS NULL RETURN

RETURN

DECLARE @clone_id INT, @sure nvarchar(255), @text nvarchar(255),@size nvarchar(255)
EXEC sp_api_modal_get N'my_last_clone_id',@text OUT
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @basetable,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Size',@max=20, @value= @size OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Clone? (Esc=Nee)', @valueout = @sure OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
IF @sure is not null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids
		EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids,N'size=''EDIT'', stock=0'
		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		UPDATE xstock SET Size = @size WHERE id = @clone_id
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'
	END

DECLARE @wat nvarchar(200), @linktoME int,@text nvarchar(max)

IF {[ctr2].cth_fase} NOT IN (N'openSale','openPrice')
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_Alert N'Let op!', N'De verkoop is reeds gesloten. U kan niet meer de toewijzing wijzigen.' 
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END

SET @linktoME ={[ctr2].id}
--201028 erbij ivm overbrengen..
if @LinkToMe is NULL set @LinkToMe={[ctr_overbrengen].id}

DECLARE @maxTeLinken INT,@maxBeschikbaar INT
SELECT @maxTeLinken = (ctrAmount-IVTOTAL) FROM Q_xTransactionDetail WHERE ID=@LinkToME

IF @maxTeLinken = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Regel is al volledig toegewezen'
		EXEC	 sp_api_go2 1 -- 1 stap terug (+list view; detailviewgebruik EXEC sp_api_go2 1,0)
		RETURN;
	END


SET @maxBeschikbaar = {[ctr1_toewijsbaar].available}
IF @maxBeschikbaar < @maxTeLinken
	BEGIN
		declare @Melding nvarchar(200)
		set @Melding = concat(N'Niet genoeg beschikbaar! Te linken:',N' ',@maxTeLinken)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @Melding,N'h4 text-muted'
		SET @text = CONCAT('U kunt maximaal ',@maxBeschikbaar,' van de ',@maxTeLinken,' linken')
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,N'm-4'
		SET @maxTeLinken = @maxBeschikbaar
	END

IF @maxTeLinken < 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Probleem!',N'Regel heeft meer toegewezen dan mag. Ga naar de toewijzing (IV link) en verlaag deze.'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END

DECLARE @aantalTeLinken INT = @maxTeLinken

BEGIN
EXEC sp_api_toast @land
SELECT [Amount@] = Amount, [Description*] = Description, [Contentdesc*] = ContentDesc, LVO, xProdCode, TransactionDate
INTO #StockSoldList
FROM          RV_StockSold
WHERE		(TDTDT = 2) 
AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)


AND ((@ProdCode is NULL OR @ProdCode = '') AND (@ProdCode2 is NULL OR @ProdCode2 = '') AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)
OR (xProdCode between @ProdCode AND @ProdCode2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null))

EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#StockSoldList',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2,5,4 ASC',@print=1
END

DECLARE @Code nvarchar(50) --CURRENCY, DIESEL, ...
DECLARE @ContextID INT -- context van de huidige kaart
DECLARE @mes nvarchar(200)--, @xDesc nvarchar(200)
DECLARE @prijs nvarchar(20),@aantal nvarchar(20) --='100'

DECLARE @xValRateID INT = {[xValRate].id}

if isnull(@xValRateID,0) = 0 -- 0 bij splinternieuwe kaart, dan geen koersen zetten op deze manier
	BEGIN

		

		--EXEC SP_API_TOAST N'Er kan geen nieuwe waarde worden toegevoegd. Dit kan alleen op bestaande xValrate kaarten.'
		--RETURN;
		declare @xCURR_ID int = {[currency].id}
		declare @xVALID int 
		if @xCURR_ID is not null
			select @xVALID = id from xValue where code='CURRENCY' and ContextID=@xCURR_ID and returntype='F'

		if @xVALID is not null
			begin
				INSERT INTO [dbo].[xValrate]
        	   ([xVal_ID]
           		,[code]
           		,[contextID]
           		,[F]
           		,[StartDate]
           		,[ReturnType]
           		,[EndDate])
select 	[ID]
          ,[code]
          ,[contextID]
          ,[F]
          ,@main_db.dbo.ABCBOM()
          ,[ReturnType]
          ,NULL
from xvalue where id=@xVALID

	
return; -- nieuw record. stoppen. Als men een koers wil ingeven, dan nog een keer klikken..
		-- we kunnen ook het nieuwe inserted ID  hier in @ContextID stoppen...

			end

				
	END


select @Code=code
		, @ContextID=ContextID
		--, @CardStartDate =startdate 
	from xvalrate where ID=@xValrateID
exec sp_api_toast @code
--return;

declare @datum nvarchar(512)	--input
DECLARE @koers nvarchar(20)		--input
set @mes=N'Invoeren van een nieuwe waarde'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text = @mes,@class = 'h3 text-muted'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Datum'
SET @datum = dbo.strdate(getdate())--'2020-10-30'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Ingangsdatum:',@value= @datum OUT,@class = 'w-25' ,@focus=1
EXEC sp_api_toast @datum

EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Waarde op deze datum:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='koers',@value = @koers OUT
IF @Koers>N'' SET @Koers=replace(@Koers, ',', '.') -- zorg dat punten en komma's als dec. seperator zijn toegestaan..


DECLARE @button nvarchar(128)
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Toevoegen',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
IF @button IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		exec @main_db.dbo.SetxValRate_F 	@Code = @Code	,@ContextID =@ContextID	,@StartDate =@datum	,@F =@koers
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear		
		if @Code=N'CURRENCY'
			begin
				declare @TT nvarchar(200)=concat(N'CTHTOTALS: currency ',@ContextID,'  naar: ',@koers)
				exec @main_db.dbo._Writelog @TT
				update T  set t.currencyXrate=@koers 
				from xcthtotals T inner join xtransactionheader cth on cth.id=t.cth_id
				where t.lfdate>=@datum and cth.currency_id=@contextID
			end		
		RETURN
	END

	END

DECLARE @clone_id INT, @sure nvarchar(255), @text nvarchar(255)
EXEC sp_api_modal_get N'my_last_clone_id',@text OUT
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @basetable,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Clone? (Esc=Nee)', @valueout = @sure OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
IF @sure is not null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids
		EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids,N'size=''EDIT'', stock=0'
		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'
	END

DECLARE @clone_id INT, @sure nvarchar(255), @text nvarchar(255),@size nvarchar(255)
EXEC sp_api_modal_get N'my_last_clone_id',@text OUT
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @basetable,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Size',@max=20, @value= @size OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Clone? (Esc=Nee)', @valueout = @sure OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
IF @sure is not null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids
		EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids,N'size=''EDIT'', stock=0'
		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		UPDATE xstock SET Size = @size WHERE id = @clone_id
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'
	END

EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'F*ck Off','h1'
RETURN

--RH210215 BEZIG DOWNLOAD ALS CSV ER BIJ.. lukt nofg niet..
DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128),@companyname nvarchar(128), @FileName nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
SET @companyname = (select CompanyName from xcompany where id = @id)
set @Filename=concat(@Companyname,'.csv')
/*EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Zoek op transport bedrijf'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Transporteur',@value = @TransComp OUT,@focus=1,@select=1 -- zoek veld
*/
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24',@focus=1,@select=1  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')
SET @button = 'Intrastat_Melding'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Intrastat_Melding',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Excel_CSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @companyname,N'h4 text-muted',@printonly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_print

IF @button =  'Intrastat_Melding'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY@] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE~col-sm-5] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT@] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT@] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_Melding
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_Melding',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2 ASC',@print=1

END 
	

IF @button =  'Excel_CSV'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_CSV
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
--EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV',@print=1
--EXEC sp_api_modal_csv	@tmptable = '#Intrastat_CSV'	,@filename = @filename	,@sep = ';'

--EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV'
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV',@ansi =1,@filename=@FileName

END

DECLARE @clone_id INT, @sure nvarchar(255), @text nvarchar(255),@size nvarchar(255)
EXEC sp_api_modal_get N'my_last_clone_id',@text OUT
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @basetable,'h1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Size',@max=20, @value= @size OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Clone? (Esc=Nee)', @valueout = @sure OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
IF @sure is not null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids
		EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids,N'size=''EDIT'', stock=0'
		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		UPDATE xstock SET Size = @size WHERE id = @clone_id
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'
	END

DECLARE @wat nvarchar(200), @linktoME int,@text nvarchar(max)

IF {[ctr2].cth_fase} NOT IN (N'openSale','openPrice')
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_Alert N'Let op!', N'De verkoop is reeds gesloten. U kan niet meer de toewijzing wijzigen.' 
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END

SET @linktoME ={[ctr2].id}
--201028 erbij ivm overbrengen..
if @LinkToMe is NULL set @LinkToMe={[ctr_overbrengen].id}

DECLARE @maxTeLinken INT,@maxBeschikbaar INT
SELECT @maxTeLinken = (ctrAmount-IVTOTAL) FROM Q_xTransactionDetail WHERE ID=@LinkToME

IF @maxTeLinken = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Regel is al volledig toegewezen'
		EXEC	 sp_api_go2 1 -- 1 stap terug (+list view; detailviewgebruik EXEC sp_api_go2 1,0)
		RETURN;
	END


SET @maxBeschikbaar = {[ctr1_toewijsbaar].available}
IF @maxBeschikbaar < @maxTeLinken
	BEGIN
		declare @Melding nvarchar(200)
		set @Melding = concat(N'Niet genoeg beschikbaar! Te linken:',N' ',@maxTeLinken)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @Melding,N'h4 text-muted'
		SET @text = CONCAT('U kunt maximaal ',@maxBeschikbaar,' van de ',@maxTeLinken,' linken')
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,N'm-4'
		SET @maxTeLinken = @maxBeschikbaar
	END

IF @maxTeLinken < 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Probleem!',N'Regel heeft meer toegewezen dan mag. Ga naar de toewijzing (IV link) en verlaag deze.'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END

DECLARE @aantalTeLinken INT = @maxTeLinken
	,@button nvarchar(50)

EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Aantal',@value = @aantalTeLinken OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Link aantal',@valueout=@button OUT,@key=N'Enter'
IF @button IS NULL RETURN
set @wat=N'Gekozen ID: '+str(@ID)+' wordt gekoppeld aan CTR: '+str(@LinktoME)
exec sp_api_toast @wat
--RETURN; --test

if @linktoME is not null
	BEGIN
		exec @main_db.dbo.map @linktoME,@ID, @aantalTeLinken
		
		--zet return path
		SET @ctr2_id = {[ctr2].id}
		SET @verkoop_id = {[verkoop].id}
		IF @ctr2_id IS NOT NULL AND @verkoop_id IS NOT NULL AND @aantalTeLinken = @maxTeLinken
			BEGIN
				SET @goto = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2/',@ctr2_id,'/iv2')
				SET @referer_path = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2')
				SET @referer_search = CONCAT(N'?id=',@ctr2_id)
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Regel(s) is/zijn gelink bla',N'alert-primary'				
				EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@referer_path,@referer_search=@referer_search
			END
		--210115 
--		exec sp_api_go3
		exec sp_api_modal_clear
	END


--if @parent_card_name='ctr2'
--	BEGIN
--		exec @main_db.dbo.map @ID, @Parent_ID
--	END
--else --neem aan parent_parent...
--	BEGIN
--		exec @main_db.dbo.map @ID, @Parent_Parent_ID
--	END

--EXEC sp_api_goto @path

OPEN @cursor;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @idval
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
	END
CLOSE @cursor;
DEALLOCATE @cursor;

DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128), @ProdCode nvarchar(128), @ProdCode2 nvarchar(128),@land nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
--SET @button = 'StockSoldList'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class = 'w75'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Lvo:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'Country',@value = @land OUT, @focus=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24'  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')

EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van ProdCode:'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name=N'xstock',@value = @ProdCode OUT,@placeholder=N'Zoek...'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='ProdCode',@value = @ProdCode OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met ProdCode:'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name=N'xstock',@value = @ProdCode2 OUT,@placeholder=N'Zoek...'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='ProdCode2',@value = @ProdCode2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld

EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'StockSoldList',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_print @keycode='F9'

IF @button =  'StockSoldList'
BEGIN
EXEC sp_api_toast @land
SELECT [Amount@] = Amount, [Description*] = Description, [Contentdesc*] = ContentDesc, LVO, xProdCode, TransactionDate
INTO #StockSoldList
FROM          RV_StockSold
WHERE		(TDTDT = 2) 
AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)


AND ((@ProdCode is NULL OR @ProdCode = '') AND (@ProdCode2 is NULL OR @ProdCode2 = '') AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)
OR (xProdCode between @ProdCode AND @ProdCode2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null))

EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#StockSoldList',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2,5,4 ASC',@print=1
END

DECLARE @search nvarchar(128) ,@button nvarchar(128), @datumtijd nvarchar(50)
DECLARE @filename nvarchar(1024) 
,@VroegNegatiefdownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'VroegNegatief.csv'
,@Negatiefdownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Negatief.csv'
,@Reserveddownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Gereserveerd.csv'
,@Notzerodownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Voorraad.csv'
SET @datumtijd = FORMAT(getdate(),'dd MMM yyyy HH:mm')

--EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='search',@value = @search OUT,@focus=1 -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class = 'w100'
SET @button = 'VroegNegatief'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VroegNegatief',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Negatief',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F2'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Gereserveerd',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F3'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Alles',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F4'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VolledigeLijst',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Partijvoorraad',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F6'
EXEC sp_api_modal_print @keycode='F9'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @datumtijd, @printonly=1

IF @button =  'VroegNegatief'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Vroeg Negatief' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #VroegNegatief
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND ([EndTime*] = 'Vroeg') AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#VroegNegatief',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VroegNegatiefNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'VroegNegatiefNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Vroeg Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #VroegNegatiefdownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND ([EndTime*] = 'Vroeg') AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#VroegNegatiefdownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @VroegNegatiefdownload,@ansi=1
END 


IF @button =  'Negatief'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #Negatief
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Negatief',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'NegatiefNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'NegatiefNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #Negatiefdownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Negatiefdownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Negatiefdownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'Gereserveerd'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT ReservedIn@, ReservedOut@, [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Gereserveerd' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #Gereserveerd
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (ReservedIn@ <> 0 OR ReservedOut@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Gereserveerd',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],3 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'GereserveerdNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'GereserveerdNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, ReservedIn@, ReservedOut@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Gereserveerd' AS [CAP*]
INTO #GereserveerdNaarCSV
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (ReservedIn@ <> 0 OR ReservedOut@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#GereserveerdNaarCSV',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Reserveddownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'Alles'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Alles' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@ --, [Correctie] = '         '
INTO #Notzero
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
SET @datumtijd = FORMAT(getdate(),'dd MMM yyyy HH:mm')
DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max) = N'ALTER TABLE #Notzero ADD ' + QUOTENAME(@datumtijd+'~col-sm-2') +' nvarchar(128)'
EXEC (@sql)
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Notzero',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@fontsize='120%',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'AllesNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

--

IF @button =  'Partijvoorraad'
BEGIN
SELECT CatSub_0 as [CatSub*], Variety_0 as [Botanic~col-sm-2 wrap],ContentDesc as [inhoud~col-sm-1],Size as [maat~col-sm-1],Detail_0 as [Detail~col-sm-1],Origin_Code as [LVO~col-sm-1-2] ,KGN as [Kgn~col-sm-1],FustCode as [Fustcode~col-sm-1],TransactionHeader_ID as [InkNr:0~col-sm-1] 
,	left(counter_code,8) as [Lev~col-sm-1],	LEFT((select CONVERT(VARCHAR, LFDATE , 13)), 6) as [Datum~col-sm-1]
,	Voorraad as [Stock:0~col-sm-1]

INTO #PartijStock
FROM          @main_db.dbo.StockPerLot_date(dbo.abcdate()) -- alles verkocht t/m vandaag!
where [catsub_0] > N'' -- RH210209 hiermee wordt fust weggelaten
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#PartijStock'
,@orderby=N'ORDER BY [catsub*],[Botanic~col-sm-2 wrap]  ASC'
,@fontsize='100%',@print=1
END 


IF @button =  'AllesNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #Notzerodownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Notzerodownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Notzerodownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'VolledigeLijst'
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @datum nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Kies de datum voor de voorraadlijst (dit is een lange lijst!!)'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='datum',@value = @datum OUT
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = 'Laad lijst',@valueout = @button2 OUT,@class = 'btn-success',@key = 'Enter'

		IF @button2 IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN
				SELECT *
				INTO #VolledigeLijst
				FROM @main_db.dbo.stockByDate(@datum)
				EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#VolledigeLijst',@orderby=N'ORDER BY ARTIKEL ASC'
			END
	END

EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class=N'w100'

DECLARE @value nvarchar(max),@country_id nvarchar(max),@city_id nvarchar(max),@menu_id nvarchar(max),@company_id nvarchar(max),@reducer nvarchar(max)

DECLARE @aantal nvarchar(128),@aantalCol nvarchar(128),@new_id INT,@text nvarchar(128), @size nvarchar(128)
DECLARE @button nvarchar(128)
 
IF (SELECT size FROM xlotartsize WHERE id=@id) is null OR (SELECT cp120 FROM xlotartsize WHERE id=@id) is null
	BEGIN
		--EXEC sp_api_toast N'MAAT END C.P.P. IS VERPLICHT BIJ xLOTARTSIZE',N'bg-danger text-white p-4 center'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Voordat u Lotpallets kunt ingeven, moeten de velden MAAT en C.P.P. ingevuld zijn bij xLotArtSize'
		--EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'MAAT END C.P.P. IS VERPLICHT BIJ xLOTARTSIZE2222'
		--EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'MAAT END C.P.P. IS VERPLICHT BIJ xLOTARTSIZE223333322'

		DECLARE @search nvarchar(2000) = N'?focus=10240'
		SET @path = @path + '/' + @id
		EXEC sp_api_goto @path,@search
		return
	end

SET @Aantal = isnull(@Aantal,0)--201007 zet het pallet-aantal OP 0 als er wel collis zijn

BEGIN
	DECLARE @LotBase_ID INT = {[lotbase].id}
	EXEC sp_api_toast @id
	EXEC sp_api_toast @aantal
	EXEC sp_api_toast @LotBase_ID

	EXEC @main_db.dbo.FillxLotpalletFromLAS @xLotArtSize_ID = @id,@Pallets = @aantal,@Colli = @aantalCol, @LotBase_ID = @LotBase_ID, @new_id = @new_id OUT
END

IF @button IS NOT NULL 
	BEGIN
		IF @Aantal >0 --202007 alleen als er pallets zijn ingevuld direct door naar lotpallets, niet bij losse colli..
			begin
				SET @path = REPLACE(@path,'/lotartsize','/lotpallets')
				SET @text = N'?ord=&id=' + dbo.nv(@new_id )
				EXEC sp_api_modal_pathname @pathname = @path,@search = @text

	END

SET @reducer=N'in_main_menu = 1'

	,@modalRouteSql = N'''/'' + name'
	--,@reducer=@reducer

IF @path='/' EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value='Home',@valueout=NULL,@class='btn-tracy',@key='Escape'

IF @menu_id IS NULL RETURN
EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
SELECT @path = CONCAT('/',name) FROM api_card WHERE id = @menu_id
EXEC sp_api_modal_pathname @path,NULL

DECLARE @company_id nvarchar(32),@button nvarchar(128),@new_id nvarchar(32),@goto nvarchar(2000),@search nvarchar(2000)
,@button1 nvarchar(128) = N'Nieuwe verkoop'
,@button2 nvarchar(128) = N'Laatste open verkoop'

EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'klant',@value = @company_id OUT,@focus = 1
IF @company_id > 0
BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button1,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Insert'
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button2,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Enter'

	IF @button = @button1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'CounterParty_ID',@company_id,0
			EXEC @new_id = sp_api_modal_save N'verkoop',0
			IF @new_id > 0
				BEGIN
					SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
					EXEC sp_api_toast N'Nieuwe verkoop gestart',N'alert-primary'
					SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
					EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
				END
			ELSE
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Error nieuwe verkoop',N'alert-danger'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	IF @button = @button2
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id ORDER BY id DESC)
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
END

EXEC sp_api_modal_post @card = N'apicard',@column=N'unparsed_crud_create',@value=N'dbo.hasRole(''admin'') > 0',@id=@id
EXEC sp_api_modal_post @card = N'apicard',@column=N'unparsed_crud_read',@value=N'dbo.hasRole(''admin'') > 0',@id=@id
EXEC sp_api_modal_save @card = N'apicard',@id=@id

--update xlfctr SET ischecked=iif(ischecked=0,1,0) WHERE id=@ID;
--EXEC sp_api_toast 'LFCTR Check gewijzigd'
DECLARE @idval int, @docdesc nvarchar(128)

-- CVG 21/10/19 Controleer of de LFCTR reeds al gelinkt is aan een verkoop welke niet meer status "openSale" heeft. Indien dit zo is mag ik niet meer ge unchecked worden.
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 100 * FROM xIVLINK IVL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Q_xTransactionDetail ctr where 
EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader cth WHERE cth.[status] != 'openSale' AND id = ctr.transactionheader_id) 
AND ctr.id = IVL.ITD AND IVL.VTD IN (SELECT CTR_ID FROM XLFCTR WHERE ischecked = 1 AND ID IN ({@ids})))) 
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'LET OP!',N'Regels zijn reeds toegewezen aan een verkoop welke niet meer de status "openSale" heeft. U kan de regel niet meer van "checked" afhalen.'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END
	
IF {[inkomende_landfreight].To_Location_ID} IN (SELECT ID FROM xLocation WHERE isEntrepot = 1)
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'De regel wordt gelost op een transito lokatie!',N'Enkel (Richard of Sabine mogen dit uitlossen!)'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		RETURN
	END

DECLARE @cursor_xLFCTR CURSOR

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 0)
	BEGIN
		SET @action = 1
	END
ELSE
	BEGIN
		SET @action = 0
		IF {[inkomende_landfreight].id} is not null
		BEGIN
		UPDATE XLANDFREIGHT SET i_selected = 0 where ID = {[inkomende_landfreight].id}
		END
	END

IF @action = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 1)
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Deze geselecteerde regels staan al op checked:'
		SET @cursor_xLFCTR = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT id FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 1
		OPEN @cursor_xLFCTR;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @text = (SELECT docDescription FROM xlfctr where id = @idval)
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor_xLFCTR;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor_xLFCTR;
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value = 'Doorgaan', @valueout = @button OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
		IF @button IS NULL RETURN
	END
	
	SET @cursor_xLFCTR = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
	OPEN @cursor_xLFCTR;
	FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		BEGIN
			--IF (SELECT ischecked FROM xlfctr where id = @idval) = 0
			--BEGIN
				UPDATE xlfctr SET ischecked = @action WHERE id = @idval
				/*
				EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'xlfctr',N'ischecked',@action,@idval
				EXEC sp_api_modal_save N'xlfctr',@idval
				*/
/*			END
			ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @docdesc = concat('Een geselecteerde regel staat al op checked zie: ',(SELECT docDescription FROM xlfctr where id = @idval))
				EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Zeker weten?',@docdesc
				EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'xlfctr',N'ischecked',0,@idval
				EXEC sp_api_modal_save N'xlfctr',@idval
			END
*/
		--UPDATE xlfctr SET ischecked=iif(ischecked=0,1,0) WHERE id=@ID;
			
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
		END
CLOSE @cursor_xLFCTR;
DEALLOCATE @cursor_xLFCTR;

EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear

--RH210215 BEZIG DOWNLOAD ALS CSV ER BIJ.. lukt nofg niet..
DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128),@companyname nvarchar(128), @FileName nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
SET @companyname = (select CompanyName from xcompany where id = @id)
set @Filename=concat(@Companyname,'.csv')
/*EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Zoek op transport bedrijf'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Transporteur',@value = @TransComp OUT,@focus=1,@select=1 -- zoek veld
*/
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'

EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')
SET @button = 'Intrastat_Melding'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Intrastat_Melding',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Excel_CSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @companyname,N'h4 text-muted',@printonly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_print

IF @button =  'Intrastat_Melding'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY@] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE~col-sm-5] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT@] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT@] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_Melding
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_Melding',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2 ASC',@print=1

END 
	

IF @button =  'Excel_CSV'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_CSV
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
--EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV',@print=1
--EXEC sp_api_modal_csv	@tmptable = '#Intrastat_CSV'	,@filename = @filename	,@sep = ';'

--EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV'
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV',@ansi =1,@filename=@FileName

END

DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128), @ProdCode nvarchar(128), @ProdCode2 nvarchar(128),@land nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
--SET @button = 'StockSoldList'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class = 'w75'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Lvo:'

EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24'  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')

EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van ProdCode:'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name=N'xstock',@value = @ProdCode OUT,@placeholder=N'Zoek...'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='ProdCode',@value = @ProdCode OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met ProdCode:'
--EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name=N'xstock',@value = @ProdCode2 OUT,@placeholder=N'Zoek...'

EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'StockSoldList',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_print @keycode='F9'

IF @button =  'StockSoldList'
BEGIN
EXEC sp_api_toast @land
SELECT [Amount@] = Amount, [Description*] = Description, [Contentdesc*] = ContentDesc, LVO, xProdCode, TransactionDate
INTO #StockSoldList
FROM          RV_StockSold
WHERE		(TDTDT = 2) 
AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)


AND ((@ProdCode is NULL OR @ProdCode = '') AND (@ProdCode2 is NULL OR @ProdCode2 = '') AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null)
OR (xProdCode between @ProdCode AND @ProdCode2) AND (Origin_ID = @land OR @land is null))

EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#StockSoldList',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2,5,4 ASC',@print=1
END

DECLARE @search nvarchar(128) ,@button nvarchar(128), @datumtijd nvarchar(50)
DECLARE @filename nvarchar(1024) 
,@VroegNegatiefdownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'VroegNegatief.csv'
,@Negatiefdownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Negatief.csv'
,@Reserveddownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Gereserveerd.csv'
,@Notzerodownload nvarchar(128) = dbo.strdate(NULL) +'_'+ 'Voorraad.csv'
SET @datumtijd = FORMAT(getdate(),'dd MMM yyyy HH:mm')

--EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='search',@value = @search OUT,@focus=1 -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_modal @class = 'w100'
SET @button = 'VroegNegatief'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VroegNegatief',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F1'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Negatief',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F2'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Gereserveerd',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F3'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Alles',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F4'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VolledigeLijst',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Partijvoorraad',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F6'
EXEC sp_api_modal_print @keycode='F9'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @datumtijd, @printonly=1

IF @button =  'VroegNegatief'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Vroeg Negatief' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #VroegNegatief
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND ([EndTime*] = 'Vroeg') AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#VroegNegatief',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'VroegNegatiefNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'VroegNegatiefNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Vroeg Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #VroegNegatiefdownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND ([EndTime*] = 'Vroeg') AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#VroegNegatiefdownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @VroegNegatiefdownload,@ansi=1
END 


IF @button =  'Negatief'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #Negatief
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Negatief',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'NegatiefNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'NegatiefNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #Negatiefdownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ < 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Negatiefdownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Negatiefdownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'Gereserveerd'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT ReservedIn@, ReservedOut@, [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Gereserveerd' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@
INTO #Gereserveerd
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (ReservedIn@ <> 0 OR ReservedOut@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Gereserveerd',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],3 ASC',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'GereserveerdNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

IF @button =  'GereserveerdNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, ReservedIn@, ReservedOut@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Gereserveerd' AS [CAP*]
INTO #GereserveerdNaarCSV
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (ReservedIn@ <> 0 OR ReservedOut@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#GereserveerdNaarCSV',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Reserveddownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'Alles'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT [Description~col-sm-5] = Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Alles' AS [CAP*]
	,[verwacht@g] = VoorraadVerwacht@, [Voorraad@g] = Voorraad@ --, [Correctie] = '         '
INTO #Notzero
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
SET @datumtijd = FORMAT(getdate(),'dd MMM yyyy HH:mm')
DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max) = N'ALTER TABLE #Notzero ADD ' + QUOTENAME(@datumtijd+'~col-sm-2') +' nvarchar(128)'
EXEC (@sql)
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Notzero',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],1 ASC',@fontsize='120%',@print=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'AllesNaarCSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-success'
END 

--

IF @button =  'Partijvoorraad'
BEGIN
SELECT CatSub_0 as [CatSub*], Variety_0 as [Botanic~col-sm-2 wrap],ContentDesc as [inhoud~col-sm-1],Size as [maat~col-sm-1],Detail_0 as [Detail~col-sm-1],Origin_Code as [LVO~col-sm-1-2] ,KGN as [Kgn~col-sm-1],FustCode as [Fustcode~col-sm-1],TransactionHeader_ID as [InkNr:0~col-sm-1] 
,	left(counter_code,8) as [Lev~col-sm-1],	LEFT((select CONVERT(VARCHAR, LFDATE , 13)), 6) as [Datum~col-sm-1]
,	Voorraad as [Stock:0~col-sm-1]

INTO #PartijStock
FROM          @main_db.dbo.StockPerLot_date(dbo.abcdate()) -- alles verkocht t/m vandaag!
where [catsub_0] > N'' -- RH210209 hiermee wordt fust weggelaten
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#PartijStock'
,@orderby=N'ORDER BY [catsub*],[Botanic~col-sm-2 wrap]  ASC'
,@fontsize='100%',@print=1
END 


IF @button =  'AllesNaarCSV'
BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT Voorraad@, VoorraadVerwacht@, Description, Origin_Code, Size, xBrandName, ContentDesc, FustCode, 'Negatief' AS [CAP*]
INTO #Notzerodownload
FROM          RV_IR_Voorraad
WHERE        (Voorraad@ <> 0) AND (CoreType = 'FOOD')
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Notzerodownload',@orderby=N'ORDER BY [CAP*],Description ASC', @filename= @Notzerodownload,@ansi=1
END 

IF @button =  'VolledigeLijst'
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @datum nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Kies de datum voor de voorraadlijst (dit is een lange lijst!!)'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='datum',@value = @datum OUT
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = 'Laad lijst',@valueout = @button2 OUT,@class = 'btn-success',@key = 'Enter'

		IF @button2 IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN
				SELECT *
				INTO #VolledigeLijst
				FROM @main_db.dbo.stockByDate(@datum)
				EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#VolledigeLijst',@orderby=N'ORDER BY ARTIKEL ASC'
			END
	END

declare @SID INT,@text nvarchar(255)
select @SID=supplier_id from p_PriceEntryRow PER where PER.ID=@ID

DECLARE @company_id nvarchar(32),@button nvarchar(128),@new_id nvarchar(32),@goto nvarchar(2000),@search nvarchar(2000)
,@button1 nvarchar(128) = N'Nieuwe verkoop'
,@button2 nvarchar(128) = N'Laatste open verkoop'

EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'klant',@value = @company_id OUT,@focus = 1
IF @company_id > 0
BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button1,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Insert'
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button2,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Enter'

	IF @button = @button1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'CounterParty_ID',@company_id,0
			EXEC @new_id = sp_api_modal_save N'verkoop',0
			IF @new_id > 0
				BEGIN
					SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
					EXEC sp_api_toast N'Nieuwe verkoop gestart',N'alert-primary'
					SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
					EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
				END
			ELSE
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Error nieuwe verkoop',N'alert-danger'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	IF @button = @button2
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id ORDER BY id DESC)
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
END

--EXEC sp_api_toast 'LFCTR Check gewijzigd'
DECLARE @idval int, @docdesc nvarchar(128)

-- CVG 21/10/19 Controleer of de LFCTR reeds al gelinkt is aan een verkoop welke niet meer status "openSale" heeft. Indien dit zo is mag ik niet meer ge unchecked worden.
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 100 * FROM xIVLINK IVL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Q_xTransactionDetail ctr where 
EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader cth WHERE cth.[status] != 'openSale' AND id = ctr.transactionheader_id) 
AND ctr.id = IVL.ITD AND IVL.VTD IN (SELECT CTR_ID FROM XLFCTR WHERE ischecked = 1 AND ID IN ({@ids})))) 
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'LET OP!',N'Regels zijn reeds toegewezen aan een verkoop welke niet meer de status "openSale" heeft. U kan de regel niet meer van "checked" afhalen.'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END
	
IF {[inkomende_landfreight].To_Location_ID} IN (SELECT ID FROM xLocation WHERE isEntrepot = 1)
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'De regel wordt gelost op een transito lokatie!',N'Enkel (Richard of Sabine mogen dit uitlossen!)'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		RETURN
	END

DECLARE @cursor_xLFCTR CURSOR

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 0)
	BEGIN
		SET @action = 1
	END
ELSE
	BEGIN
		SET @action = 0
		IF {[inkomende_landfreight].id} is not null
		BEGIN
		UPDATE XLANDFREIGHT SET i_selected = 0 where ID = {[inkomende_landfreight].id}
		END
	END

IF @action = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 1)
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Deze geselecteerde regels staan al op checked:'
		SET @cursor_xLFCTR = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT id FROM xlfctr where id IN ({@ids}) AND ischecked = 1
		OPEN @cursor_xLFCTR;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @text = (SELECT docDescription FROM xlfctr where id = @idval)
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor_xLFCTR;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor_xLFCTR;
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value = 'Doorgaan', @valueout = @button OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'
		IF @button IS NULL RETURN
	END
	
	SET @cursor_xLFCTR = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
	OPEN @cursor_xLFCTR;
	FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		BEGIN
			--IF (SELECT ischecked FROM xlfctr where id = @idval) = 0
			--BEGIN
				UPDATE xlfctr SET ischecked = @action WHERE id = @idval
				/*
				EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'xlfctr',N'ischecked',@action,@idval
				EXEC sp_api_modal_save N'xlfctr',@idval
				*/
/*			END
			ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @docdesc = concat('Een geselecteerde regel staat al op checked zie: ',(SELECT docDescription FROM xlfctr where id = @idval))
				EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Zeker weten?',@docdesc
				EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'xlfctr',N'ischecked',0,@idval
				EXEC sp_api_modal_save N'xlfctr',@idval
			END
*/
		--UPDATE xlfctr SET ischecked=iif(ischecked=0,1,0) WHERE id=@ID;
			
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_xLFCTR INTO @idval
		END
CLOSE @cursor_xLFCTR;
DEALLOCATE @cursor_xLFCTR;

real_usage_examples.sql_source:
--text, class, translate (bit)
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies Enter om de vorige prijzen te gebruiken.',@translate=1 --vertaalbaar
DECLARE @button nvarchar(128) --button nodig om DECLARE oude SET nog te hebben.
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Okay!',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter' --is initieel leeg
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = 'Nah',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Escape' --is initieel leeg
IF @button IS NULL EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all --STEP 1 SELECT all
 -- na klik
IF @button = 'Nah' OR @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear -- einde formweergave; handel alleen nog de CURSOR af
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear --STEP 2 SELECT clear all en de rest
	END
IF @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN

		DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
		-- onderbreek de actie alos er meer dan 1 leverancier in DECLARE selectie voor komt
		if	(SELECT count( distinct supplier_ID) FROM p_PriceEntryRow where id in (SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,','))) > 1
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Selecteer niet meer dan 1 leverancier!'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_clear 
				return;
			END

		SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor_ids;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				UPDATE p_PriceEntryRow SET PriceHi = OldPriceHi, PriceLo = OldPriceLo WHERE id = @cid
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
			END
		CLOSE @cursor_ids;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

	END

IF @id = @ids
	EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all
ELSE
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'There is already a selection present.','py-1'
		DECLARE @valueout nvarchar(255)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Option',@value = 'Add', @valueout = @valueout OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='A'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Option',@value = 'New', @valueout = @valueout OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='N'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Option',@value = 'Clear', @valueout = @valueout OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='C'
		IF @valueout IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
				IF @valueout = 'Clear' EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
				IF @valueout = 'Add' EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all
				IF @valueout = 'New'
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
						EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all
					END
			END
	END
