IF @id<>@ids --BULK naar Exact
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT,@count int = 0,@seconds int = 0
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @seconds+=6
				SET @subject = CONCAT(
					(SELECT [xCompany].[Code] FROM [xCompany] WHERE [id] = (SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[fromCompany_ID] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval))
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[dateInvoice] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[calcLegal] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					)
				SET @sql = CONCAT(N'DECLARE @base64 nvarchar(max),@filename nvarchar(4000)
', --EXEC sp_api_report_download_base64 @context = ''invoice_out'', @context_id = ',@idval,' , @filename =  @filename OUT, @base64 =  @base64 OUT
'BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice ',@idval,',@groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	UPDATE xInvoice SET status = ''Exact Error'',statusHistory = ERROR_MESSAGE() WHERE id = ',@idval,'
END CATCH') -- = @filename,@subject = ',dbo.escape_string(@subject),',@base64 = @base64')
				SET @subject = N'To Exact: ' + @subject
				EXEC sp_api_add_sql_task @sql=@sql,@description=@subject,@seconds = @seconds
				UPDATE xInvoice SET status='Sending to Exact' WHERE id = @idval
				SET @count+=1
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor;
		execute sp_api_modal_clear
		IF @count > 0 EXEC sp_api_toast N'Verzenden is ingepland, F5 voor refresh'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
		RETURN
	END

BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice @id, @groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	DECLARE @text nvarchar(max) = ERROR_MESSAGE(),@ERROR_SEVERITY int = ERROR_SEVERITY()
	IF @ERROR_SEVERITY = 17
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_url @text
			RETURN
		END
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
	DECLARE @valueout nvarchar(128)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Retry',@value = 'Retry', @valueout = @valueout OUT
		,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
END CATCH

IF @id<>@ids --BULK naar Exact
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT,@count int = 0,@seconds int = 0
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @seconds+=6
				SET @subject = CONCAT(
					(SELECT [xCompany].[Code] FROM [xCompany] WHERE [id] = (SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[toCompany_ID] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval))
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[dateInvoice] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[calcLegal] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					)
				SET @sql = CONCAT(N'DECLARE @base64 nvarchar(max),@filename nvarchar(4000)
', --EXEC sp_api_report_download_base64 @context = ''invoice_out'', @context_id = ',@idval,' , @filename =  @filename OUT, @base64 =  @base64 OUT
'BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice ',@idval,',@groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	UPDATE xInvoice SET status = ''Exact Error'',statusHistory = ERROR_MESSAGE() WHERE id = ',@idval,'
END CATCH') -- = @filename,@subject = ',dbo.escape_string(@subject),',@base64 = @base64')
				SET @subject = N'To Exact: ' + @subject
				EXEC sp_api_add_sql_task @sql=@sql,@description=@subject,@seconds = @seconds
				UPDATE xInvoice SET status='Sending to Exact' WHERE id = @idval
				SET @count+=1
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor;
		execute sp_api_modal_clear
		IF @count > 0 EXEC sp_api_toast N'Verzenden is ingepland, F5 voor refresh'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
		RETURN
	END

BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice @id, @groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	DECLARE @text nvarchar(max) = ERROR_MESSAGE(),@ERROR_SEVERITY int = ERROR_SEVERITY()
	IF @ERROR_SEVERITY = 17
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_url @text
			RETURN
		END
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
	DECLARE @valueout nvarchar(128)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Retry',@value = 'Retry', @valueout = @valueout OUT
		,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
END CATCH

--text, class, translate (bit)
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies Enter om de vorige prijzen te gebruiken.',@translate=1 --vertaalbaar
DECLARE @button nvarchar(128) --button nodig om DECLARE oude SET nog te hebben.
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Okay!',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter' --is initieel leeg
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button2',@value = 'Nah',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Escape' --is initieel leeg
IF @button IS NULL EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all --STEP 1 SELECT all
 -- na klik
IF @button = 'Nah' OR @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear -- einde formweergave; handel alleen nog de CURSOR af
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear --STEP 2 SELECT clear all en de rest
	END
IF @button = 'Okay!'
	BEGIN

		DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
		-- onderbreek de actie alos er meer dan 1 leverancier in DECLARE selectie voor komt
		if	(SELECT count( distinct supplier_ID) FROM p_PriceEntryRow where id in (SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,','))) > 1
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Selecteer niet meer dan 1 leverancier!'
				EXEC sp_api_modal_clear 
				return;
			END

		SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor_ids;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				UPDATE p_PriceEntryRow SET PriceHi = OldPriceHi, PriceLo = OldPriceLo WHERE id = @cid
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
			END
		CLOSE @cursor_ids;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

	END

real_usage_examples.sql_source:
DECLARE @company_id nvarchar(32),@new_id nvarchar(32),@goto nvarchar(2000),@search nvarchar(2000), @location_id nvarchar(32), @reducer nvarchar(max), @date nvarchar(128), @opmerking nvarchar(128), @opmerkingrelation nvarchar(128)
,@transactiondate nvarchar(128)
,@button nvarchar(128)
,@button1 nvarchar(128) = N'Nieuwe verkoop'
,@button2 nvarchar(128) = N'Laatste open verkoop'
,@button3 nvarchar(128) = N'Gereserveerde verkoop'
,@button4 nvarchar(128) = N'Naar lokaties'
,@button5 nvarchar(128) = N'Eigen lokaties'
,@button6 nvarchar(128) = N'Werk lokaties'
,@buttonescape nvarchar(128) = N'Ga terug'
,@buttongoahead nvarchar(128) = N'Ga door'
set @date = dbo.workDate()
SET @transactiondate = dbo.abcdate()

IF dbo.workDate() <> dbo.abcdate() AND @button IS NULL
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'LET OP! DE WERKDATUM STAAT NIET OP VANDAAG.','text-danger font-weight-bold'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value=@buttongoahead,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Pagedown',@class='bg-danger text-light'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value=@buttonescape,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='ESCAPE',@class='bg-danger text-light'
		IF @button = @buttonescape
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	END
	
IF @button = @buttongoahead OR dbo.workdate() = dbo.abcdate()
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een klant:','text-primary'
	--SET @reducer = CONCAT('company_id = ',@company_id)
	SET @reducer = 'isDisabled = 0'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'klant',@value = @company_id OUT,@reducer = @reducer,@focus = 1
	END
	
IF @company_id > 0 

BEGIN
	--DECLARE @only_new_is_possible BIT = 0
	DECLARE @reducer_location nvarchar(max) = N'Company_ID = ' + @company_id + ' OR id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID =' + @company_id + ')'
--	DECLARE @reducer_location nvarchar(max) = N'id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID =' + @company_id + ')'
	IF (SELECT LOCATIONS = count(Location_ID) FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id) > 1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Vertrek Datum:','text-primary'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Logistic',@value = @opmerking OUT,@placeholder = N'Opmerking voor loods'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Relation',@value = @opmerkingrelation OUT,@placeholder = N'Referentie voor klant'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een sublocatie van klant:','text-primary'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'xlocation',@value = @location_id OUT,@reducer = @reducer_location
			/*
				IF @location_id > 0
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
					END
			*/
		END
	IF (SELECT LOCATIONS = count(Location_ID) FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id) = 1 AND (SELECT LOCATIONS = count(id) FROM xLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id) = 1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Vertrek Datum:','text-primary'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Logistic',@value = @opmerking OUT,@placeholder = N'Opmerking voor loods'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Relation',@value = @opmerkingrelation OUT,@placeholder = N'Referentie voor klant'
		END
	/*
	SELECT id = xLocation.id, name=LocationCode
		INTO #locations
		FROM xLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id OR id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable = N'#locations',@value = @location_id OUT,@focus=1,@class='mt-3'
	*/

	--IF @location_id > 0

	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een optie:','text-primary font-weight-bold display-4 text-center'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button1,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Enter'
	
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate <= @date)
		BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button2,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='F2'
		END
		
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button4,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='F1'
	IF @button = @button4
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
			EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button5,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='1'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button6,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='2'
		END
			IF @button = @button5
				BEGIN
					DECLARE @GotoOwnLocatie nvarchar(2000)
					SET @GotoOwnLocatie = N'/adres/'+@company_id+'/xlocation'
					EXEC sp_api_goto @GotoOwnLocatie,@referer_path=N'/verkoop'
				END
			IF @button = @button6
				BEGIN
					DECLARE @GotoWorkLocatie nvarchar(2000)
					SET @GotoWorkLocatie = N'/adres/'+@company_id+'/company_locations'
					EXEC sp_api_goto @GotoWorkLocatie,@referer_path=N'/verkoop'
				END
		
		/*
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date)
		BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button3,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='F2'
			SELECT TOP 1
				tv_companyname
				,transactiondate
				,[GERESERVEERD*] = 'GERESERVEERD'
				,id
				INTO #LASTORDER
			FROM q_xtransactionheader
			WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date ORDER BY id DESC
			EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#LASTORDER',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 3 ASC'
		END
		*/
/*		
ELSE
		IF (select COUNT(id) from xlocation where company_id = @company_id ) = 1 
			BEGIN
				SET @only_new_is_possible = 1
			END
*/ 
	IF @button = @button1 --OR @only_new_is_possible = 1
		BEGIN
		DELETE FROM api_storage WHERE card_id = (SELECT id FROM api_card WHERE name = N'verkoop') AND child_id = 0 AND user_id = @user_id
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'CounterParty_ID',@company_id,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Destination_ID',@location_id,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'TransactionDate',@transactiondate,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'advTransportDep',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'unloadingdate',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'loadingdate',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Logistic',@opmerking,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Relation',@opmerkingrelation,0
			EXEC @new_id = sp_api_modal_save N'verkoop',0
			IF @new_id > 0
				BEGIN
					/*SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'*/
					SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2/0/stockloc_ctr2'
					EXEC sp_api_toast N'Nieuwe verkoop gestart',N'alert-primary'
					--SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
					SET @search = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2'
					DECLARE @update_current_search nvarchar(4000) =CONCAT(N'?id=',@new_id)
					EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@search,@referer_search=N'',@update_current_search=@update_current_search
				END
			ELSE
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Error nieuwe verkoop',N'alert-danger'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	IF @button = @button2
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate <= @date ORDER BY id DESC)
			/*SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'*/
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2/0/stockloc_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2'
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@search,@referer_search=N''
			--SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			--EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
	IF @button = @button3
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date ORDER BY id DESC)
			/*SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'*/
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2/0/stockloc_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/ctr2'
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@search,@referer_search=N''
			--SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			--EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@buttonescape,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='ESCAPE',@class='bg-danger text-light'
	IF @button = @buttonescape
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN;
	END
END

DECLARE @company_id nvarchar(32),@new_id nvarchar(32),@goto nvarchar(2000),@search nvarchar(2000), @location_id nvarchar(32), @reducer nvarchar(max), @date nvarchar(128), @opmerking nvarchar(128), @opmerkingrelation nvarchar(128)
,@button1 nvarchar(128) = N'Nieuwe verkoop'
,@button2 nvarchar(128) = N'Laatste open verkoop'
,@button3 nvarchar(128) = N'Gereserveerde verkoop'
,@buttonescape nvarchar(128) = N'Ga terug'
,@buttongoahead nvarchar(128) = N'Ga door'
set @date = dbo.workDate()

IF dbo.workDate() <> dbo.abcdate() AND @button IS NULL
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'LET OP! DE WERKDATUM STAAT NIET OP VANDAAG.','text-danger font-weight-bold'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value=@buttongoahead,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='+',@class='bg-danger text-light'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@button',@value=@buttonescape,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='ESCAPE',@class='bg-danger text-light'
		IF @button = @buttonescape
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	END
	
IF @button = @buttongoahead OR dbo.workdate() = dbo.abcdate()
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een klant:','text-primary'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'klant',@value = @company_id OUT,@focus = 1
	SET @reducer = CONCAT('company_id = ',@company_id)
	END
	
IF @company_id > 0 

BEGIN
	--DECLARE @only_new_is_possible BIT = 0
	DECLARE @reducer_location nvarchar(max) = N'Company_ID = ' + @company_id + ' OR id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID =' + @company_id + ')'
--	DECLARE @reducer_location nvarchar(max) = N'id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID =' + @company_id + ')'
	IF (SELECT LOCATIONS = count(Location_ID) FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id) > 1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Logistic',@value = @opmerking OUT
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Relation',@value = @opmerkingrelation OUT
			EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een sublocatie van klant:','text-primary'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_select @card_name = N'xlocation',@value = @location_id OUT,@reducer = @reducer_location
			/*
				IF @location_id > 0
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
					END
			*/
		END
	IF (SELECT LOCATIONS = count(Location_ID) FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id) = 1
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-25 mt-3',@focus=1
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Logistic',@value = @opmerking OUT
			EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Relation',@value = @opmerkingrelation OUT
		END
	/*
	SELECT id = xLocation.id, name=LocationCode
		INTO #locations
		FROM xLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id OR id IN (SELECT Location_ID FROM xCompanyxLocation WHERE Company_ID = @company_id)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable = N'#locations',@value = @location_id OUT,@focus=1,@class='mt-3'
	*/

	--IF @location_id > 0

	EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Kies een optie:','text-primary font-weight-bold display-4 text-center'
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button1,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='Insert'
	
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate <= @date)
		BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button2,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='F1'
		END
		
	IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date)
		BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@button3,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='F2'
			SELECT TOP 1
				tv_companyname
				,transactiondate
				,[GERESERVEERD*] = 'GERESERVEERD'
				,id
				INTO #LASTORDER
			FROM q_xtransactionheader
			WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date ORDER BY id DESC
			EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#LASTORDER',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 3 ASC'
		END
/*		
ELSE
		IF (select COUNT(id) from xlocation where company_id = @company_id ) = 1 
			BEGIN
				SET @only_new_is_possible = 1
			END
*/ 
	IF @button = @button1 --OR @only_new_is_possible = 1
		BEGIN
		DELETE FROM api_storage WHERE card_id = (SELECT id FROM api_card WHERE name = N'verkoop') AND child_id = 0 AND user_id = @user_id
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'CounterParty_ID',@company_id,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Destination_ID',@location_id,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'TransactionDate',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'advTransportDep',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'unloadingdate',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'loadingdate',@date,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Logistic',@opmerking,0
			EXEC sp_api_modal_post N'verkoop',N'Relation',@opmerkingrelation,0
			EXEC @new_id = sp_api_modal_save N'verkoop',0
			IF @new_id > 0
				BEGIN
					SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
					EXEC sp_api_toast N'Nieuwe verkoop gestart',N'alert-primary'
					SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
					EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
				END
			ELSE
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Error nieuwe verkoop',N'alert-danger'
			EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		END
	IF @button = @button2
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate <= @date ORDER BY id DESC)
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
	IF @button = @button3
		BEGIN
			SET @new_id = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM xTransactionHeader WHERE status=N'openSale' AND CounterParty_ID = @company_id AND Transactiondate > @date ORDER BY id DESC)
			SET @goto = N'/verkoop/'+@new_id+'/stock_ctr2'
			SET @search = N'?id='+@new_id
			EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=N'/verkoop',@referer_search=@search
		END
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value=@buttonescape,@valueout = @button OUT,@key='ESCAPE',@class='bg-danger text-light'
	IF @button = @buttonescape
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN;
	END
END

DECLARE @json nvarchar(max),@sql nvarchar(max),@columnname nvarchar(128)
	,@button nvarchar(128)
	,@object_id nvarchar(128)
	,@code_table nvarchar(128)
	,@code_column nvarchar(128)
	,@caption_column nvarchar(128)
	,@option nvarchar(max)

SELECT @sql = sql,@columnname=name FROM api_card_fields WHERE id = @card_field_id AND (sql is null OR sql = '')
IF @columnname is null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_toast N'Field does not exist or already has sql output (clear first!)'
		RETURN
	END

EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a code TABLE'
SELECT * INTO #sys_tables FROM (SELECT id=name, name FROM sys_tables UNION SELECT id=name, name FROM @main_db.sys.views) tbl

EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_tables',@value = @code_table OUT
SELECT @object_id = object_id FROM sys_tables WHERE name = @code_table
IF @object_id IS NULL SELECT @object_id = object_id FROM @main_db.sys.views WHERE name = @code_table
IF @object_id Is NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a CODE column'
		SELECT id=name, name INTO #sys_columns_code FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_columns_code',@value = @code_column OUT
		IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id AND name = @code_column)
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a CAPTION column'
				SELECT id=name, name INTO #sys_columns_caption FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id
				EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_columns_caption',@value = @caption_column OUT
				IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id AND name = @caption_column)
					BEGIN
--						EXEC sp_api_modal_text @sql
						EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Create a select', @valueout = @button OUT	,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
						IF @button IS NOT NULL
							BEGIN
								EXEC sp_api_populate_card_views @tablename = @code_table
								SET @sql = N'SELECT '+QUOTENAME(@code_column)+','+QUOTENAME(@caption_column)
									+' FROM '+QUOTENAME(@code_table)+' ORDER BY 2 FOR JSON PATH, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES'
								DECLARE @attr_id_extra INT = (SELECT id FROM api_attributes WHERE name = 'extra')
								DECLARE @attr_id_element INT = (SELECT id FROM api_attributes WHERE name = 'element')
								DELETE FROM api_card_field_attributes WHERE field_id = @card_field_id AND attr_id IN (@attr_id_extra,@attr_id_element)
								INSERT INTO api_card_field_attributes (attr_id,sql,field_id) VALUES
									(@attr_id_element,'''Select''',@card_field_id),(@attr_id_extra,@sql,@card_field_id)
								EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
							END
					END
			END
	END

if {[ctr2].Amount} is not null --we zitten op ctr2
	begin

		DECLARE @count_iv2 INT = (SELECT sum(linkaantal) FROM xIvlink WHERE ITD = @id or vtd = @id)-- RH210116 OR vtd.. er bij (er was een overmatige toewijzing)
		DECLARE @DIFF INT 
		set @DIFF=	( select isnull({[ctr2].Amount}*iif({[ctr2].stockmut}=0,0,1),0) - @count_iv2)
		EXEC SP_API_TOAST @diff
		IF ISNULL(@count_iv2,0)=0 or @DIFF > 0 --@count_iv2 <>isnull({[ctr2].Amount}*iif({[ctr2].stockmut}=0,0,1),0)--= 0
			BEGIN
				IF NOT EXISTS (select * from @main_db.dbo.ctr1_Assignable(NULL,@id))
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Geen partij met voorraad beschikbaar!'
						EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
						RETURN
					END
				SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/ctr1_toewijsbaar'
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				IF @DIFF < 0 -- meer toegewezen dan de ctr groot is
					BEGIN
						EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Er is te veel toegewezen!, verlaag de toewijzing of verwijder een toewijzing!'	
					END	
				SET @path = @path+'/'+@id+'/iv2'
			END
	
		EXEC sp_api_goto @path
	end

DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128),@companyname nvarchar(128), @FileName nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
SET @companyname = (select CompanyName from xcompany where id = @id)
set @Filename=concat(@Companyname,'.csv')
/*EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Zoek op transport bedrijf'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Transporteur',@value = @TransComp OUT,@focus=1,@select=1 -- zoek veld
*/
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24',@focus=1,@select=1  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')
SET @button = 'Intrastat_Melding'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Intrastat_Melding',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Excel_CSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @companyname,N'h4 text-muted',@printonly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_print

IF @button =  'Intrastat_Melding'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY@] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE~col-sm-5] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT@] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT@] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_Melding
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_Melding',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2 ASC',@print=1

END 
	

IF @button =  'Excel_CSV'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_CSV
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO

--EXEC sp_api_modal_csv	@tmptable = '#Intrastat_CSV'	,@filename = @filename	,@sep = ';'

--EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV'
EXEC sp_api_modal_csv @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_CSV',@ansi =1,@filename=@FileName

END

	BEGIN
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT,@count int = 0,@seconds int = 0
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @seconds+=6

IF @card_name = 'card_fields' SET @populate_card_id = @parent_id

EXEC sp_api_populate_card @populate_card_id
--RETURN
DECLARE @pop_id int,@table nvarchar
	DECLARE @cursor_api_card CURSOR
	SET @cursor_api_card = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT id FROM api_card
		WHERE id <> @populate_card_id AND (tablename = (SELECT ISNULL(tablename,'qwerq4232we2342rwe') FROM api_card WHERE id = @populate_card_id)
			OR basetable = (SELECT ISNULL(basetable,'qwerqw2346e23rwe') FROM api_card WHERE id = @populate_card_id))
	OPEN @cursor_api_card;
	FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_api_card INTO @pop_id
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		BEGIN
			DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max) = CONCAT(N'EXEC sp_api_populate_card ',@pop_id)
			EXEC sp_api_add_sql_task @sql
			--EXEC sp_api_populate_card @pop_id
			FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_api_card INTO @pop_id
		END
	CLOSE @cursor_api_card;
	DEALLOCATE @cursor_api_card;

DECLARE @field_name nvarchar(128),@text nvarchar(max)
SELECT @field_name = name FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id AND id = @card_field_id
SET @text = N'This will delete field ['+@field_name+'] and its attributes. Re-populate, so it may come back'
EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Warning!',@text
DELETE FROM api_card_fields WHERE card_id = @card_id AND id = @card_field_id
EXEC sp_api_populate_card @card_id
EXEC sp_api_modal_clear

DECLARE @json nvarchar(max),@sql nvarchar(max),@columnname nvarchar(128)
	,@button nvarchar(128)
	,@object_id nvarchar(128)
	,@code_table nvarchar(128)
	,@code_column nvarchar(128)
	,@caption_column nvarchar(128)
	,@option nvarchar(max)

SELECT @sql = sql,@columnname=name FROM api_card_fields WHERE id = @card_field_id AND (sql is null OR sql = '')
IF @columnname is null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_toast N'Field does not exist or already has sql output (clear first!)'
		RETURN
	END

EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a code TABLE'
SELECT * INTO #sys_tables FROM (SELECT id=name, name FROM sys_tables UNION SELECT id=name, name FROM @main_db.sys.views) tbl

EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_tables',@value = @code_table OUT
SELECT @object_id = object_id FROM sys_tables WHERE name = @code_table
IF @object_id IS NULL SELECT @object_id = object_id FROM @main_db.sys.views WHERE name = @code_table
IF @object_id Is NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a CODE column'
		SELECT id=name, name INTO #sys_columns_code FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_columns_code',@value = @code_column OUT
		IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id AND name = @code_column)
			BEGIN
				EXEC sp_api_modal_text N'Choose a CAPTION column'
				SELECT id=name, name INTO #sys_columns_caption FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id
				EXEC sp_api_modal_select_table @tmptable=N'#sys_columns_caption',@value = @caption_column OUT
				IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys_columns WHERE object_id = @object_id AND name = @caption_column)
					BEGIN
--						EXEC sp_api_modal_text @sql
						EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Sure',@value = 'Create a select', @valueout = @button OUT	,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
						IF @button IS NOT NULL
							BEGIN
								EXEC sp_api_populate_card_views @tablename = @code_table
								SET @sql = N'SELECT '+QUOTENAME(@code_column)+','+QUOTENAME(@caption_column)
									+' FROM '+QUOTENAME(@code_table)+' ORDER BY 2 FOR JSON PATH, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES'
								DECLARE @attr_id_extra INT = (SELECT id FROM api_attributes WHERE name = 'extra')
								DECLARE @attr_id_element INT = (SELECT id FROM api_attributes WHERE name = 'element')
								DELETE FROM api_card_field_attributes WHERE field_id = @card_field_id AND attr_id IN (@attr_id_extra,@attr_id_element)
								INSERT INTO api_card_field_attributes (attr_id,sql,field_id) VALUES
									(@attr_id_element,'''Select''',@card_field_id),(@attr_id_extra,@sql,@card_field_id)
								EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
							END
					END
			END
	END

	EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
	DECLARE @valueout nvarchar(128)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Retry',@value = 'Retry', @valueout = @valueout OUT
		,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
END CATCH

IF @id<>@ids --BULK naar Exact
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT,@count int = 0,@seconds int = 0
		SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
		OPEN @cursor;
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
		WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @seconds+=6
				SET @subject = CONCAT(
					(SELECT [xCompany].[Code] FROM [xCompany] WHERE [id] = (SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[toCompany_ID] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval))
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[dateInvoice] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					,' - ',(SELECT [Q_xInvoice].[calcLegal] FROM [Q_xInvoice] WHERE [id] = @idval)
					)
				SET @sql = CONCAT(N'DECLARE @base64 nvarchar(max),@filename nvarchar(4000)
', --EXEC sp_api_report_download_base64 @context = ''invoice_out'', @context_id = ',@idval,' , @filename =  @filename OUT, @base64 =  @base64 OUT
'BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice ',@idval,',@groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	UPDATE xInvoice SET status = ''Exact Error'',statusHistory = ERROR_MESSAGE() WHERE id = ',@idval,'
END CATCH') -- = @filename,@subject = ',dbo.escape_string(@subject),',@base64 = @base64')
				SET @subject = N'To Exact: ' + @subject
				EXEC sp_api_add_sql_task @sql=@sql,@description=@subject,@seconds = @seconds
				UPDATE xInvoice SET status='Sending to Exact' WHERE id = @idval
				SET @count+=1
				FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval
			END
		CLOSE @cursor;
		DEALLOCATE @cursor;
		execute sp_api_modal_clear
		IF @count > 0 EXEC sp_api_toast N'Verzenden is ingepland, F5 voor refresh'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_select_all_clear
		RETURN
	END

BEGIN TRY
	EXEC @main_db.dbo.sp_iu_finance_invoice @id, @groupbycostcodes = 1
END TRY BEGIN CATCH
	DECLARE @text nvarchar(max) = ERROR_MESSAGE(),@ERROR_SEVERITY int = ERROR_SEVERITY()
	IF @ERROR_SEVERITY = 17
		BEGIN
			EXEC sp_api_modal_url @text
			RETURN
		END
	EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text
	DECLARE @valueout nvarchar(128)
	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='Retry',@value = 'Retry', @valueout = @valueout OUT
		,@class='btn-primary',@key='Enter'
END CATCH

DECLARE @rowkey nvarchar(128)
	DECLARE @myVar nvarchar(128)
	Select rowkey=newid(),* into #loop from [ a table name ] -- where ...
	
	--	loop through the data row by row
	WHILE Exists(select 1 from #loop)
	BEGIN
	--	prepare: (Select one row with tmp data)
		set @rowkey=(select top 1 rowkey from #loop)
		
	--	action: (work with the data of one row)
		set @myVar=concat('This is ',(SELECT [ a field name ] from #loop where rowkey=@rowkey))
		exec sp_api_toast @myvar

	--	finalize: (Remove the processed row)
		delete from #loop where rowkey=@rowkey
	END

	--tracy_dto_example van HM1 naar ANACOWMSX

	declare @base_url nvarchar(max); SET @base_url = CONCAT(N'https://apide.agfx.nl/anaco_wmsx/v1/',NULL)
	declare @method nvarchar(max); SET @method = CONCAT(N'api_select_positions',NULL) -- select van de method: select api_lookup=code ,api_desc=concat('code is ',code)  from @main_db.dbo.wms_stage_of_ripeness
	declare @json nvarchar(max); --hier komt de result data van de service in (data transfer object)

	--evt url paramaters (filters op result set)
	DECLARE @zoek nvarchar(max); EXEC sp_api_modal_get_value @name='@zoek', @value=@zoek OUT;	
	DECLARE @zoek_button nvarchar(max); EXEC sp_api_modal_get_value @name='@zoek_button', @value=@zoek_button OUT;

	EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='@zoek_button',@value = 'Confirm input', @valueout = @zoek_button OUT,@class='btn-danger',@key='Enter'		
	IF @zoek_button IS NULL RETURN	;

	--maak het een like seek
	if right(@zoek,1) <> '%' set @zoek=concat(@zoek,'%')

	DECLARE @params nvarchar(max) =case when @zoek >N'' then concat('code=',@zoek) else NULL end --filter op de result set wordt bij GET aan url toegevoegd als ?code=4
	--SET @json = STRING_ESCAPE(@json ,'json')
	--tracy data transfer, beveiligd met 2x locksmith (zender en ontvanger) zie https://colab.research.google.com/drive/16iI8P-XMAZCYopyeKjeZVRQ-BExJvYr5#scrollTo=RG6mN-wq4t67
	EXEC api_json_get			--	api_json_get controleert of je mag vragen; => de PROC zorgt zelf voor afzender context in de body
			@base_url=@base_url 	--@base_url mag * GEEN * method en parameters bevatten !!
			,@method=@method
			,@params=@params 			--&code=4 --filter op de result set wordt bij GET aan url toegevoegd als ?code=4
			,@apikey=N'anaco_wmsx'	--pseudo key, zie api_json_get
			,@json =@json OUT
			,@requestType=N'POST' 
			,@user=@user
--exec sp_api_toast @params
	exec sp_api_toast @json
	if @json like N'%"ok"%' return -- avoid error, ok is not a dataset

	drop table if exists ##dto;
	--api data transfer object 
	execute api_dto	@json =@json
					,@tablename =N'##dto'
					,@fill =1;

declare @filename nvarchar(512)
declare @url nvarchar(512)
declare @mail_to nvarchar(256) = @user -- the user who is currently logged-in
DECLARE @bodytext nvarchar(max) 
CREATE TABLE #files (filename nvarchar(4000),path nvarchar(4000))
SELECT id,name FROM api_files WHERE context = @card_name AND context_id = @id

DECLARE @cursor CURSOR,@idval INT
SET @cursor = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR 
		SELECT id,name FROM api_files 
		WHERE context = @card_name AND context_id = @id -- IN ({@ids})
OPEN @cursor;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval,@filename
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_file_set @api_files_id=@idval,@url = @url OUT
        INSERT INTO #files (filename,path) VALUES(@filename,@url)
        SET @bodytext = CONCAT(@bodytext,CHAR(13),@url)
		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor INTO @idval,@filename
	END
CLOSE @cursor;
DEALLOCATE @cursor;

if @bodytext is null set @bodytext=concat(N'Hereby we send you the files for dossier ',@id,' (',@card_name,')')
EXEC sp_api_email @mail_to,@subject,@bodytext,@attachments = @attachments --filename en path

	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids

		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'

IF @sure is not null
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
		--EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids
		EXEC @clone_id = sp_clone_record @basetable,@ids,N'size=''EDIT'', stock=0'
		SET @path = @path+'/'+dbo.nv(@clone_id)
		UPDATE xstock SET Size = @size WHERE id = @clone_id
		EXEC sp_api_toast @text = N'Record cloned'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_route @name = N'Ga met Enter naar de kopie en vul de nieuwe maat in',@pathname=@path,@search='?focus=7377' ,@class = N'btn-danger' ,@key='Enter'
	END

DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
DECLARE @toCompany_ID INT 
DECLARE @fromCompany_ID INT = (select top 1 id from xTenantKey)
		

SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
OPEN @cursor_ids;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_toast @cid
		--dit is nu alleen voor tellers en checks, zodat we weten dat het report al is gemaakt:
		--was		EXEC @main_db.dbo.RunReport	@TABLECONTEXT = N'CTH'	,@Context_Key_ID=@cid,@Report_CODE=N'CONF_DELIVERY' -- zie runreport 
		--nu
		EXEC @main_db.dbo.SetDelConf @cid --210224 Registreer verzending van DeliveryConfirmation via xMarker

		--dit is de feitelijke "run"
		SET @toCompany_ID = (select Counterparty_id from xtransactionheader where id=@cid)
		EXEC sp_api_report_generate @id = @cid
			,@sys_report_key = 'deliveryconfirmation_out' --zie xrepdef
			,@toCompany_ID = @toCompany_ID
			,@fromCompany_ID = @fromCompany_ID
			,@fixedprinter_ID=2
			,@test=0




		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
	END
CLOSE @cursor_ids;
DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

--RH210215 BEZIG DOWNLOAD ALS CSV ER BIJ.. lukt nofg niet..
DECLARE @date nvarchar(128),@date2 nvarchar(128),@button nvarchar(128),@button2 nvarchar(128),@companyname nvarchar(128), @FileName nvarchar(128)
set @date = dbo.workDate()
set @date2 = dbo.workDate()
SET @companyname = (select CompanyName from xcompany where id = @id)
set @Filename=concat(@Companyname,'.csv')
/*EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Zoek op transport bedrijf'
EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Transporteur',@value = @TransComp OUT,@focus=1,@select=1 -- zoek veld
*/
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Van:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date',@value = @date OUT,@class='w-24',@focus=1,@select=1  -- zoek veld
EXEC sp_api_modal_text 'Tot en met:'
EXEC sp_api_modal_date @name='Date2',@value = @date2 OUT,@class='w-24' -- zoek veld
--SET @date2 = CONCAT(@date2,' 23:59:59.999')
SET @button = 'Intrastat_Melding'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Intrastat_Melding',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'Enter'
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Excel_CSV',@valueout = @button OUT,@class = 'btn-primary',@key = 'F5'
EXEC sp_api_modal_text @companyname,N'h4 text-muted',@printonly=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_print

IF @button =  'Intrastat_Melding'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY@] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE~col-sm-5] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT@] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT@] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_Melding
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO
EXEC sp_api_modal_table @tmptable=N'#Intrastat_Melding',@orderby=N'ORDER BY 2 ASC',@print=1

END 
	

IF @button =  'Excel_CSV'
BEGIN
SELECT distinct [QUANTITY] = sum(QUANTITY@), [ARTICLE] = ARTICLE, LAND, INTRASTAT_CODE, [NETT_WEIGHT] = sum(NETT_WEIGHT@), ISO, [AMOUNT] = sum(AMOUNT@)
INTO #Intrastat_CSV
FROM          RV_INTRASTAT_MELDING
WHERE		(INTRASTAT_CODE is not NULL) AND (CompanyID = @id) AND (TransactionDate BETWEEN @date AND @date2) AND (THTDT = 2)
GROUP BY ARTICLE,LAND,INTRASTAT_CODE,ISO

EXEC sp_api_toast N'leveringsbevestiging....' 

DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
DECLARE @toCompany_ID INT 
DECLARE @fromCompany_ID INT = (select top 1 id from xTenantKey)
		

SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
OPEN @cursor_ids;
FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_toast @cid
		--dit is nu alleen voor tellers en checks, zodat we weten dat het report al is gemaakt:
		--was		EXEC @main_db.dbo.RunReport	@TABLECONTEXT = N'CTH'	,@Context_Key_ID=@cid,@Report_CODE=N'CONF_DELIVERY' -- zie runreport 
		--nu
		EXEC @main_db.dbo.SetDelConf @cid --210224 Registreer verzending van DeliveryConfirmation via xMarker

		--dit is de feitelijke "run"
		SET @toCompany_ID = (select Counterparty_id from xtransactionheader where id=@cid)
		EXEC sp_api_report_generate @id = @cid
			,@sys_report_key = 'deliveryconfirmation_out' --zie xrepdef
			,@toCompany_ID = @toCompany_ID
			,@fromCompany_ID = @fromCompany_ID
			,@fixedprinter_ID=2
			,@test=0




		FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
	END
CLOSE @cursor_ids;
DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

DECLARE @wat nvarchar(200), @linktoME int,@text nvarchar(max)

IF {[ctr2].cth_fase} NOT IN (N'openSale','openPrice')
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_api_modal_Alert N'Let op!', N'De verkoop is reeds gesloten. U kan niet meer de toewijzing wijzigen.' 
	EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	RETURN
	END

SET @linktoME ={[ctr2].id}
--201028 erbij ivm overbrengen..
if @LinkToMe is NULL set @LinkToMe={[ctr_overbrengen].id}

DECLARE @maxTeLinken INT,@maxBeschikbaar INT
SELECT @maxTeLinken = (ctrAmount-IVTOTAL) FROM Q_xTransactionDetail WHERE ID=@LinkToME

IF @maxTeLinken = 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Regel is al volledig toegewezen'
		EXEC	 sp_api_go2 1 -- 1 stap terug (+list view; detailviewgebruik EXEC sp_api_go2 1,0)
		RETURN;
	END


SET @maxBeschikbaar = {[ctr1_toewijsbaar].available}
IF @maxBeschikbaar < @maxTeLinken
	BEGIN
		declare @Melding nvarchar(200)
		set @Melding = concat(N'Niet genoeg beschikbaar! Te linken:',N' ',@maxTeLinken)
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @Melding,N'h4 text-muted'
		SET @text = CONCAT('U kunt maximaal ',@maxBeschikbaar,' van de ',@maxTeLinken,' linken')
		EXEC sp_api_modal_text @text,N'm-4'
		SET @maxTeLinken = @maxBeschikbaar
	END

IF @maxTeLinken < 0
	BEGIN
		EXEC sp_api_modal_alert N'Probleem!',N'Regel heeft meer toegewezen dan mag. Ga naar de toewijzing (IV link) en verlaag deze.'
		EXEC sp_api_modal_clear
	END

DECLARE @aantalTeLinken INT = @maxTeLinken
	,@button nvarchar(50)

EXEC sp_api_modal_input @name='Aantal',@value = @aantalTeLinken OUT,@focus=1,@select=1
EXEC sp_api_modal_button @name='button',@value = 'Link aantal',@valueout=@button OUT,@key=N'Enter'
IF @button IS NULL RETURN
set @wat=N'Gekozen ID: '+str(@ID)+' wordt gekoppeld aan CTR: '+str(@LinktoME)
exec sp_api_toast @wat
--RETURN; --test

if @linktoME is not null
	BEGIN
		exec @main_db.dbo.map @linktoME,@ID, @aantalTeLinken
		
		--zet return path
		SET @ctr2_id = {[ctr2].id}
		SET @verkoop_id = {[verkoop].id}
		IF @ctr2_id IS NOT NULL AND @verkoop_id IS NOT NULL AND @aantalTeLinken = @maxTeLinken
			BEGIN
				SET @goto = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2/',@ctr2_id,'/iv2')
				SET @referer_path = CONCAT('/verkoop/',@verkoop_id,'/ctr2')
				SET @referer_search = CONCAT(N'?id=',@ctr2_id)
				EXEC sp_api_toast N'Regel(s) is/zijn gelink bla',N'alert-primary'				
				EXEC sp_api_goto @goto,@referer_path=@referer_path,@referer_search=@referer_search
			END
		--210115 
--		exec sp_api_go3
		exec sp_api_modal_clear
	END


--if @parent_card_name='ctr2'
--	BEGIN

--	END
--else --neem aan parent_parent...

declare @ctrtoloc int, @ctrfromloc int ,@checkamt int-- (oorspronkelijke) advieslokaties
declare @Direct int=1
declare @Normaal int=2
declare @isEqual bit=0

select @ctrtoloc =tocloc_id, @ctrfromloc=frmloc_id,@checkamt=iif(stockmut=1,amount,0) from xtransactiondetail where id=@ID
update xtransactiondetail set Flowmodel_id=@Normaal where id=@ID
update xlfctr set ltrtoloc=@ctrtoloc,ltrfromloc=@ctrfromloc, @isEqual=iif(lfctr_amount-@checkamt=0,1,0) where ctr_id=@ID and lfctr_amount=@checkamt -- let op: dit gaat alleen goed bij volledige ctr op lfctr!


if @isEqual=1 begin
	--pas ook de lfctr aan van de aan deze inkoopregel gelinkte verkoopregels
	DECLARE @cursor_ids CURSOR,@cid INT
	SET @cursor_ids = CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR (select ITD as ivCTR from xivlink where vtd=@ID UNION select VTD as ivCTR from xivlink where itd=@ID) --SELECT value FROM string_split(@ids,',')
	OPEN @cursor_ids;
	FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		BEGIN
			--geef de lfctr van de verkoop ctr een nieuwe laadlokatie
			update xtransactiondetail set Flowmodel_id=@Normaal where id=@cid
			update xlfctr set ltrfromloc=@ctrtoloc where ctr_id=@cid
			FETCH NEXT FROM @cursor_ids INTO @cid
		END
	CLOSE @cursor_ids;
	DEALLOCATE @cursor_ids;

end
